The Netflix App is pretty much one of the worst in the market these days. It fails miserably on simple tasks, like it routinely shows you visually that it remembers where you left off (red bar is in about the right place, button text says resume), but when you try to resume, it simply starts at the beginning. This happens about 15% of the time when you stop and resume on the same device, and almost half the time when you are changing devices. The UI is also a disaster and just getting worse all the time. Your “My List” will randomly disappear or relocate itself, the team is proud of the dark ui changes they make, which make the product harder to use but artificially inflate their use/engagement numbers, and various menu items like notifications or whole content sections will randomly disappear and reappear or just bug out when you select anything. The app will only go into PiP mode about 80% of the time, and always pauses. The app also pauses on tablets when you slide anything over. Like, WHY?! The subscription has become much more expensive, and content quality is getting worse every day. The company seems to think their UI and processes are good, but really they’re not, they just had a great idea and implemented it before everyone else, so they were the only way and many people grew up with and got used to it, but it never made it good. Their foreign content (non-US) is still very good, but also seems to be on the decline, and their streaming quality is still very good. Their US content, however, only has a few good properties left and tend to be one-offs or seasons from much earlier that are wrapping up. They like to say they have the best products, properties, culture, etc, but they really don’t. I use the iOS products the most, but their android apps are no better, and I use the web and smart tv app on occasion and they are definitely worse. The frustration of using this app is no longer worth the price with so many other, better, cheaper options available. | I pay great money for the services and i can’t even use it on all platforms. they underpay actors and actresses for the streaming services, but then they overpay us, so where is the money going? Dont buy; just pirate shows.

title: Jízdní řády IDOS
description:
Oblíbený bezplatný nástroj pro vyhledávání spojení v novém! Nový design a uživatelské prostředí, vyšší stabilita a rychlost, aktuální data všech dostupných jízdních řádů pro vlaky, autobusy a MHD. 

Aplikace je podporována na iOS 8 a vyšším. Dotazy a problémy prosím pište na appdev@idnes.cz. Děkujeme.

Hlavní funkce:
	• Vyhledání vlakových, autobusových a MHD spojů včetně zadání zastávky z mapy
	• Online vyhledávání = vždy aktuální a oficiální informace včetně zpoždění a výluk
	• Offline možnost si prohlížet historii vyhledaných spojení
	• Inteligentní našeptávač zastávek a adres s návrhem oblíbených spojů
	• Automatická detekce MHD jízdního řádu a nejbližší zastávky dle GPS
	• Výběr dopravních prostředků v Rozšířeném nastavení a nastavení zobrazených možností v Nastavení
	• SMS jízdenky
	• Široké možnosti sdílení spojení
	• Zobrazení odjezdů/příjezdů z vybrané zastávky s možností filtrovat na konkrétní spoj
	• Uložení 6 spojení do oblíbených, 6 posledních hledání v historii s offline přístupem k výsledkům hledání
	• Vyhledávání bezbariérových spojení, spojení pro cyklisty nebo pro cestující s dětmi
	• Podrobné informace o spoji včetně nástupiště, koleje, čísle zastávky, zpoždění, aktuální pozice spoje na mapě, výlukách, orientační ceně jízdného a řazení vlakových vozů s popisem
	• Zobrazení trasy a polohy spoje na mapě
	• Kontextové propojení do prodejních systémů třetích stran pro rezervaci/zakoupení jízdného
	• Zobrazení legendy k použitým piktogramům
	• Nápověda - průvodce aplikací
	• Možnost odstranění reklam na vždy za poplatek (naleznete v nastavení pod ikonou Více)
	
Možnosti vyhledávání
	• Postupné zadávání názvu a zužování výběru z našeptávače
	• Zadání začátku názvu
	• Zadání začátků slov - např. "P H" = Praha Hradčanská
	• Zadání textu obsaženého v názvu - např.  "UAN" = Ostrava UAN, Brno UAN, Praha UAN
	• Možnost zadat jako cíl adresu nebo název objektu - např. "Praha, Divadlo v Dlouhé" nebo "Praha, Ve Smečkách" = najde nejbližší zastávku k tomuto bodu a spojení z výchozí polohy hledání
	• Možnost zadat "!" Před název zastávky nebo cíle a omezí se našeptávač na první nalezenou položku např. "!Ben" = Benešov
releaseNotes:
Updates in the 2.13.2 version

added less important features and utilities,
improved stability and bug fixes.
reviews:
This application is user friendly. I jus love that it gives you options for bus stops, tram stops, subways stations, etc. with the name or address you input. When ever there is a delay, the application lets you know. The only thing that I find problematic is that occasionally there are some routes or runnings that have been cancelled (for whatever reason- bus driver sick day, or heavy traffic, or an accident on the road,etc) and this application doesn’t let you know of these extraordinary situations. | No contact phone number 
No way to cancel the ticket 
No explanation 

WILL NEVER BUY TICKETS THROUGH THE APP EVER AGAIN!! What a rip off! | Stellar connection finder for CZ. A way better than google maps or whatever other maps apps that have the feature to look up connections on the market! | I use this app before so I knew that it used to have more functionality, namely that I can even find Polish railways/ trains to Poland, but I don’t know why I can’t search them now, and even the stops have been taken away from the app, can you explain why you developers had made this decision? hope this was just a temporary thing | Na rozdí od konkurence nereflektuje skutečný stav. U vlaků, které například z “provozních důvodů” nejedou, stále píše “bez zpoždění”. Údaje tedy nelze bohužel brát vážně. | IDOS je naprosto skvela sluzba, pouzivam ji kazdy den. | Aplikace je skvělá, má ale jeden zbytečný problém, který ji dělá na některých trasách prakticky nepoužitelnou. Jde o čas na přesun. Ten je pevně daný a připočítává se k času na přestup. Např. mezi trasami metra je přesun 3 minuty, přitom se dá pohodlně stihnout za dvě. Nebo na Nádr. Holešovice je přesun na tramvaj podle aplikace 2 minuty, přitom jedna bohatě stačí.

Kvůli tomu aplikace nenajde spoje, které se dají stihnout.

Navrhuji všechny časy na přesun zkrátit na polovinu. Kdo by to nestíhal, může si nastavit čas na přestup, který je vy výchozím nastavení 2 minuty (já používám 0). | Great app, but would be much better if it worked offline as well! | It’s always worked well for me, been using it a few years now. English version is great, easy to switch back and forth if you want to learn some Czech, too! | They finally brought back English! Thank God!

Now, if they will just bring back the favorites for stations, that'd be great. | Pokud máte uložených víc jak celou stránku oblíbených míst, tak při při skrolování dolů se nedostanete k prvnímu uloženému místu, protože ho kryje spodní lišta a dostane se tak člověk pouze na jedno nad ním. Prosím o opravu chyby. | Po poslední aktualizaci aplikace přestala zcela fungovat na iOS6! | The best *functioning* app. My only complaint is that it hasn't been updated since Feb 2013. Once this app integrates the iOS 7 design standard - it will certainly deserve all 5 stars. | Paradni aplikace - rychla, kompletni, uzivatelsky prijemna. Pouzivam ji kazdy den. | Aplikace byla super do posledniho updatu, ktery z ni udelal nepouzitelnou.. Pri kazdem hledani cela spadne.. :( Nepomaha ani restart telefonu.. | Jizdni rady nejsou aktualni, na aplikaci neni spolehnuti. | Prosím o přidání přímé podpory iOS 6 map na vyhledávání spojů | Hl výhody zdarma, aktualizované přímo z idnes, ale idos má pokročilejší funkce, ale je to App za peníze. doporučuji oboje! | Parádní aplikace!!! Lepší jak verze pro pocitac :)

title: Moje O2
description:
Mějte své služby od O2 plně pod kontrolou a navíc vždy při sobě. S aplikací Moje O2 si jednoduše, online a zdarma můžete spravovat své služby, získáte neustálý přehled o čerpání vašich dat, volání nebo SMS zprávách. V aplikaci si můžete na pár kliknutí aktivovat doplňkové služby, například Chytré cestovní pojištění, které se vždy samo zapne, když jste v roamingové zóně nebo si můžete třeba dokoupit chybějící data. Do aplikace se můžete přihlašovat pomocí otisku prstu, Face ID, zadáním uživatelského jména a hesla nebo jednorázovým přihlášením.

Budete vždy v obraze
Zapněte si mobilní oznámení a my vás budeme pravidelně informovat o novinkách

Co v aplikaci Moje O2 najdete?
- rychlý přístup ke všem vašim službám a vyúčtování
- dokup dat na pár kliknutí
- nastavení roamingu
- jednoduché nastavení doplňkových služeb
- možnost změny tarifu
- rychlou a bezpečnou platbu kartou
- dobití kreditu pro zákazníky s předplacenými tarify
- pravidelné soutěže a speciální nabídky slev
- seznam nejbližších prodejen
- propojení na další aplikace O2

V jednoduchosti je krása
Naši aplikaci Moje O2 děláme jednoduchou a přehlednou, aby se vám jednoduše a rychle ovládala. Aplikaci si můžete přepnout do oblíbeného tmavého režimu. Umí anglicky a ukrajinsky.

Je určena pro všechny zákazníky O2, včetně firemních i pro zákazníky O2 Family.
releaseNotes:
Nová verze aplikace Vám přináší:
- novou sekci Zprávy
- drobné úpravy a grafická vylepšení
Vaše O2
reviews:
Cela ta firma je banda neschopnych - stejne tak ta kampeny co tu app napsala. | App does not let you administer your accounts. The payment portal is not functioning | Nefunguje přihlašování na iOS 16.2 (20C65). Nefunguji tlačítka na obrazovkách s marketingovým souhlasem. | iPhone SE can not see the whole screen and can not interact with it. Buggy to useless. A shame. | I was happy having my phone plan in control with this app. Worked great for non business users in CZ. But a few weeks ago, the app was updated to run only on iOS 13+ which blocks out many users on older operating systems. Currently unless running IOS 13+, users can no longer log in. This needs fixing!! I'm logged out of my account! 1 star :( | Pěkný design ale přestalo fungovat propojení účtů family a o2. Je potřeba se neustále odhlašovat a přihlašovat pro přechod mezi účty. 
Platba kartou se neotvírá v Safari a může dojít k zneužití platební karty! | Wrong language I need English | Why am I being pushed a Czech version in the UK via the US app store??? | Apklikace je k ničemu. Když potřwbujete neco vyřešit tak musite volat na jejich linku zákaznickou a dožadovat se jich aby udělali Vám řekli a nastavily to co jak chcete. Většina věcí co tm dřív byla není a je to velice nelogické. Nemužete pomalu zjistit proč Vám nejde internet nebo volaní v cizině. 
Nejradši byl jim dala palec dole. | Z vcelku dobře aplikace se stal po “vylepšení” nepoužitelný paskvil | Kromě toho, že aplikace nepodporuje větší obrazovky, je zorganizovaná a funkční; plní svou roli. Vcelku hezká. | Prosím přidat rozlišení pro iP 5

title: Alza
description:
The end of the desperate searches on the Internet. You can get almost anything on Alza. Everything conveniently in one place, right in your pocket.

- Wide range of thousands of unique items (50 000+)
- Reviews, quality descriptions, photos and customer reviews
- Goods grouped by brands and parameters
- Order history and status tracking
- One-touch quick purchase
- Special offers and price deals
- Fast and convenient product search including search history
- Shopping lists for repeated purchases
- Convenient controls on iPhone and iPad
releaseNotes: This release includes bug fixes and minor enhancements based upon your suggestions and comments.
reviews:
Great | My only complaint is the app makes it too easy to part ways with my money. | I am enjoying Alza very much. If it would be possible to message me in English rather than Czech, I would appreciate it. I am an American living as a full-time resident in the Czech Republic. Thank you.
Henry Williams | Easy to buy. Hard to return. They stifle all reviews on web site and not on google reviews. If you may need to return abs item better to go to local retailer. | Always quality always on time | This app is great when ordering from ALZA! Skip the lines and pay boxes. It’s very convenient to order something and hit the button so when you arrive at a showroom your order is waiting for you. ALZA has great customer service and I’m happy to be able to shop and handle everything from my phone! | Páči sa mi to ! | Pravé jsem babičce oobrdnal ze spojených státu. Alza mi dokonce dokáže zatextovat na můj mobil. Babička samozřejmě žije v ČR.  Díky! Bude se hodit i v okolo Vánoc! 👍🏼 | The title says it all! | I do not like the fact Alza is forcing me to upgrade the App. Right now is not a good moment, it could wait for few days. Hey, Alza you need to version your backend APIs. | Jako servis výborný ale chtělo bychom levnější zboží | Je videt snaha, aplikace se postupne vylepsuje... Ale nektere veci stale funguji na webu vyrazne lepe. V posledni verzi treba nejde vybrat doprava alza express... | Some recent improvements to the returns department helpful and
this ordering application works somewhat well however...

Alza the company provides no competent human service for faulty products, refunds, or returns.

The problem then becomes solely the customers responsibility.

They do not use or respond to telephones, nor have any inter-office communications. It then becomes a "Kafka-esque" rabbit hole of burecratic denial and web based complaint forms.

No formal EU level customer support training for staff yet.

While the purchasing process has been simplified, customer support is then passed along to the manufacturer, and this retailer will not be concerned with solving or processing your concerns.

A narrow profit margin requires a narrow business plan to encourage return customers.

Will not be returning to use this application or support this company.

Keep trying Alza. Improvements  do not qualify success.

Customer satisfaction should be your ONLY objective.

Thank You. | Aplikace je fajn, clovek rychle najde co potrebuje - chce-li to ale koupit, napojeni na bankovni sluzby je pomalejsi, pada a meli by na tom jeste zapracovat.. | opravdu mohu doporučit. | Ale dobrá ;-) | Error sometime | Co řict? Proste Super :) | Alza.cz is the best e-shop in Czech republic and I am happy to see they are following trends and constantly bring innovation into CEE world.

title: EasyPark - Parking made easy
description:
EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.
releaseNotes: We update the app often to give you a fast, reliable service so you can park with confidence. Activate automatic updates to have the best experience. Let us know of ways to make your parking or charging sessions better.
reviews:
I used this app twice >2 years ago on a trip and haven’t been back to Iceland. Suddenly I started getting EasyPark charges to my credit card this year. I cannot access my account because their MFA won’t send me text messages and they refuse to refund the charges. | Terrible app, stay away from this app at all costs.  Apple pay does not work, nor does credit card | I visited Iceland in June of 2023. As of January 2024, I’m still getting charges on my credit card. I emailed the company asking for help, and they never replied back. | Unfortunately only 1 star here, no support at all. Private account is working perfectly.
Was multiple time contacted by sell department regarding open business account, now when I decided to open one, have issue to setup and no one willing to help. Try to call, the staff on the phone ask me to send email. Send email, no answer.
Sad and disappointing. | Entered my phone number, and then spent 10 minutes entering and re-entering different card numbers, and every time it says fraud. | My card was removed from the app. It’s impossible to add new card. Please fix it. | I’ve tried opening new accounts with multiple credit cards and phone numbers and still no luck. Please fix. | EasyPark is really a good App and I would have rated it higher except for one thing that could be easily corrected.  
You have to be careful if you use the very useful camera feature with a car once it is no longer in your possession  - for instance after you finished renting the car or you sold the car.  If you don’t delete the license plate from the App you will pay for the next renter’s parking. 
I wish that the App made this clearer at the time I added the license plate rather than relying on their terms and conditions to inform me.   It would be even better if the camera triggered a request to my App to approve the parking first and not automatically bill. The parking App Pango has such controls built in . | The EasyPark app and system make parking in various cities throughout Europe a breeze. Not needing to worry about carrying around enough change for the meters is wonderful! | I used the app in Italy in a rental car. I still get charged on my card 3 months later by probably somebody using the rental and get automatic bills by the camera  recognizing the license plate. | A very good app. Easy to setup and use. Very good customer service. | The app works very smoothly. I love the ever-present countdown timer on the dynamic island.  Very slick! | Very smart app. Makes parking in Iceland super easy | Foreningers have to buy a lot of roaming data just to park… more expensive than parking ticket itself | Need a membership to use the app. No thanks | I visited Iceland for 3 days and used this app successfully during our trip. Returned to the U.S. on March 31. Today is August 16. This is the second time now I’m being charged for whatever strangers out there that rented the same car we did (same plate) after we returned home.

Can’t login to my account. It doesn’t allow me to reset my password. I never received the security text code the app says it’s sending to my phone. Zero options for English speakers to get assistance through customer service. I am being forced to file a dispute with my credit card. Absolutely do NOT recommend this app for tourists using rental cars. | Very disappointing. It just sits and displays a turning circle at a phone number screen. Don’t count on it in Strasberg. | The app wants to send a text message with a code to my American number and the text never arrives.

Called customer support and they said many have called about the same thing and they didn’t have a fix for it.

I have also emailed customer support but they never replies back to my emails. | Wonderful invention! | So much better than trying to navigate a payment at the meter. Can add or stop to the meter remotely. | The only app that declining all my cards | I downloaded the app, entered my phone number and I am not getting sent the verification code.

There is no way to get help from customer service - there is not an English chat bot nor an email address.

Very frustrating. | The add payment method page will not load. With that I won’t be using the app. | There is a quirk in the EasyPark system that causes their system to create a double charge the first time you use them. We were in Tromso, Norway and the only parking near the Polar Museum was operated by EasyPark. We pulled into the lot and downloaded the app. We then started the online meter for our parking. We also used it that same day when we parked at Polaris, the aquarium in Tromso. EasyPark charged our credit card for both parking activations. After we got home Hertz then attempted to charge us for the same parking; I showed them that I had already paid but they said EasyPark would not reimburse them for their charge. I contacted EasyPark and this is what they said:
Hi James.
Thanks for your inquiry.
The space in the license plate has no meaning and does not affect the parking registration as the camera systems/controllers also do not register them. 
From what I can see here, you have been read in on camera at Pellerinbryggene where you actually were, and then you've gone ahead and manually started a parking in a place you weren't. Had you had camera parking enabled in your own app, it would not have been read in on hertz's account, but your own. It is your own responsibility to make sure your parkings are started at the correct place, as the system will not know it outside of cameras.
I am sorry we cannot help you with this.
Have a nice day.

To translate Patrick's response: we can double charge you because before you activated the parking on the app our camera registered your license plate. That is correct, I pulled into the parking lot, downloaded the app, and started the parking BUT because I had not registered the license plate before entering the lot, they went ahead and charged Hertz as the car belonged to them. | Son unos estafadores. De la nada te están cobrando una suscripción y cuando la quieres cancelar te cobran dos meses porque según ellos es lo que dicen sus términos y condiciones en los cuales solo aparece un mes. Les recomienda que utilicen cualquier otra app para parking.

Su servicio por correo tarda una semana en contestar si contestan y el servicio por teléfono te hacen esperar 15 minutos para no poderte dar ninguna solución | Visited Iceland last summer. Discovered that my credit card is still being charged whenever the rental car is parked in fee zones since then. The app does not allow you to remove your credit card, only update it. | I downloaded the app to park on the street, I adjusted my time for 6 hours, and discovered that I have instead selected 180 hrs. When I pressed stop parking, it gives me an error. When I try deleting the account, it says I can’t delete it because of the ongoing parking session. I am no longer parked at the location but am still being charged money. | What a great way to park and manage our time.  This makes it so easy for me.  Thank you | I downloaded this app while traveling in Europe.  The app asks you to link your PayPal account.  DO NOT DO THIS.  They won’t tell you that you are agreeing to prepay for parking whether you use it or not.  I did not use the service and these scammers charged my PayPal account €31.40.   I tried to dispute it but PayPal sided with these guys.  I was supposed to provide a copy of the user agreement as if I had access to such a thing.  Stay away from this scam.  You’ve been warned. | First asked me for a previously used license plate to activate the account. I’ve always used rental cars so had not idea. Deleted account and trying to register again, but when I put it my UK phone number and select Australia as the parking country, nothing happens. I don’t understand why they can’t just do regular accounts like everybody else. | Easy Park is a great app. It was they only one out there that let us - US citizens - pay for parking - easy to use, easy to extend - LOVED IT - until our acct was hacked. Two weeks after we left The Netherlands our credit card was being used daily for some pretty expensive parking and my phone number that I use had been changed. Had to cancel the credit card and get a new one. Easy Park needs to up their security. We only used the app once in The Hague. | I used it multiple days a week without a problem and loved the convenience. However, since a little over a week I all the sudden cannot even get into the app.  The app screen opens asking for my phone number to send a confirmation code to. I never receive the code and there’s no other way to get back into the app. There seriously should be some sort of way to trouble shoot or work around not receiving the text. I’m typing in the correct phone number and country code, I’ve checked countless times.

Super frustrating. 
So I’m back to having to use coins to pay for parking the old fashion way. | Makes parking so much easier with no coins or over payment! Thanks 👍🏾🙏🏾👍🏾 | I find EasyPark easy to use and adjust time as needed.  I appreciate partnerships like QPARK, where EasyPark can be used in place.  If I am unsure whether I need to use EasyPark in an area, I launch the software and it will either show me a pop up of the parking space number so I can set the parking time or it will tell me there is no EasyPark parking option in that area. | So many steps and then the verification email won’t show up right away. Frustrating when you just want to get going and have to spend 10m signing up to just pay for simple parking. Can’t you just accept Apple Pay with no sign up necessary?! Please make this easier. 

Plus you can only sign up with an address from a handful of European countries. | This is a simple and very functional app that avoids the problem of lacking change for parking meters. The ability to add or delete time is genius. | I’m from the United States with a US cell number parking in Switzerland being charged in Swiss Francs and they are billing my PayPal in Norwegian Kroner? Currency exchange fees add up quickly. | (in addition to easy, also extremely reliable offering high confidence of use” | If you’re traveling and happen to be switching rental cars now and then, which is pretty common on trips in foreign countries, please BE AWARE that you need to make sure to change the registration number for the car in the app. If you forget to do this, you’re TOTALLY SCREWED. I paid for parking, but we had just switched to a different rental car and I forgot to change the registration number in the app. I got a slip on my car window telling me I owed them a fine that was over 3x the amount of the parking. I submitted a complaint saying I had actually paid, just under a different registration number and I gave them that number, but no, that’s my fault and I have to pay the fine. PLUS, they’re keeping what I paid for parking under the wrong registration number!??? How is that fair?? Poor business practice and extremely unforgiving. I PAID FOR PARKING!! | Het bedrijf blokkeert direct je (zakelijke) account als een betaling mislukt. Dat is niet zoals het zou horen. Voor mij een reden om over te stappen naar een andere parkeerprovider die wel klantvriendelijk is. | Just do it, so simple! | Not sure what happened. App was working as intended but now it won’t let me make any payments. Tried reinstalling and it never sends and confirmation codes to add a new account. 

Found a backwards way through their website to create an account and now it won’t take any of the credit card info I was using before. 

Seems like a server-side issue. | It used to work, but I got signed out and I’m unable get back in. The issue is that I don’t get the SMS to verify my phone number. | App is supposed to be charging regular price in Zurich, not 15% extra. Zurich plates, Zurich address, Zurich phone number, Zurich parking place…. But app still thinks I am not in an area with the no-surcharge pricing. Please fix. | Très pratique et facile! | good app if it would work but it doesn’t allow me to perform the payment with apple pay for some reason (Apple pay is set up properly on my phone and works for other services). Neither does it allow me to just add a credit card.
I get this error since at least 6 months. | We have successfully downloaded the app, everything went well, till we started the parking: an  unhandled error occurred, please try again.. yeah, it’s really “easy”park.. thanks | Installed the app, easy breezy.
Credit card info and payment, no problem.
Installed app on different device with same mobile number, app demands a login and password. “Secure numeric code sent to mobile phone”
No place on app to set up password.
No message sent to mobile phone (yes, I entered it correctly)
Help section says to contact via email - no email on app or website for help.
Help section opens in non english language. 5 minutes later open in english.
Stockholm, there is a problem with your basic app function. | Went to Iceland on vacation and returned to
the US. Unfortunately, I forgot my password. I tried using the password recovery numerous times and I have received an sms message. I had to call my credit card company to stop this app from charging my card. Somehow they have found a ways to charge my card even though I disputed the charges and had them blocked. | Seemed to be >30% fee on top of cash fee.

title: foodora Czechia: Food Delivery
description:
Do you fancy a meal from your favourite restaurant or would you like to do a quick shop from the store? Treat yourself to a juicy burger, fresh sushi, healthy salad, sweet cake or restock your fridge. Order whatever you want, whenever you want.

Download the app and order

Our app is full of great restaurants and shops, including our online supermarket - foodora MARKET. Download the app and order.

How foodora works

Enter an address you want your order to be delivered at, we'll come to where you need us. It's morning and you have an uncontrollable craving for steak and mash, or maybe you're out of toothpaste and you're in your pajamas? Download the foodora app and your order is with you in minutes. And if you're wondering where the courier is, you can track your order in real time. 

Why foodora

Looking for popular restaurants in your area? Want to try new food? Or try out how our grocery delivery or foodora MARKET works? Order whatever you want. Our courier will be at your door in minutes, while you can make the most of your time.

Contact us

Have you ordered from us before? We are interested in your opinion so that we can continuously improve.

How did we do? Email us at zakaznici@foodora.cz

For more information, visit: www.foodora.cz
releaseNotes:
Along with the new foodora brand, we have now launched a unique program we are excited to offer our customers: foodora PRO.
Aiming to our most loyal users, the program will offer an exclusive suit of benefits through a membership fee.
reviews:

title: Google Translate
description:
Translate between up to 133 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish Gaelic, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu
releaseNotes: • Several bug fixes and usability improvements

I frequently enter a word in another language to see if I have the correct tense, and it translates back to English as if it’s correct, but when I enter it back in, in English, it doesn’t translate to the other language the same way! And when I check online, I find it’s NOT correct! This app has become far too unreliable for use when I am needing accuracy for major Crossword creation, or any other use! I hope you will address these issues, and PLEASE return it to a normal size and font!!

It doesn’t cost you anything to do it and it’s really simple, I really recommend it you should try it out on your own. | Bring back the old UI (interface) its so much better and simple to use, people would rate this app 5 stars if you bring back the old UI and it would be used more and be recommended by everyone and this app might just be #1, just update this garbage UI | Good day,

Can we please fix that 

Thank you | I can’t get past the pay to use screen.
Why is this not free. | HOLYGOOGLETRANSLATEINALLLAW | yes | Проблема с переводом скопированного текста, не могу вставить доя перевода | Google always makes unknown or nobody like myself useful like adding translate to Khmer. Thanks Google for making it free now. | It translates ANYTHING for you and if you don’t know how to speak a certain language they give you the option to have a conversation using your phone!!!! As soon as I got this app I was like oh it’s like every other app that’s asking you for money and not letting you use it. But no I well don’t get my wrong it does ask you if you want to pay a subscription but if you say no it will still let you use the app with no locked things.

Bring back the swipe to switch the translation language! bring back the list of downloaded and frequently used languages ​​that was always at the top! make 5-6 languages ​​that are often used as fixed as before! | When I upload an image with text in a foreign language with Detect language > English as the orientation, it translates, but instead of saying which language was detected, it just says ✨English > English. I had to click the text within the image, drag to highlight all of it, click "copy," then paste it in the main translation page text box. That's a lot more effort than I anticipated.

Please fix this. | Устарело
Сделайте как на андроиде | I use this app to read old American newspapers that were in German. The fount itself makes it hard to read, but this app had no problem with it.
However, navigating within the app is problematic and getting back to the original screen is next to impossible | I also been using this to transcribe some chinese writing, when verified with my Chinese friends, they said it’s all wrong.
I also travel to Mexico and use this to try and converse with Spanish speakers, I think most of the time it’s correct and then lately this past year I looked at the text or spoken words and recognized some words are wrong . Whoever is updating this need to be accurate or don’t translate because 
it can get very messy and embarrassing!
I’ll try another app for my next trip which will be india and Hindi , wish me luck ! | It mainly repeats in English whatever word I typed in Spanish. Only occasionally does it actually translate. Frustrating. | جميل بس ينقصه نطق الترجمة بالصوت 🌺 كانت موجودة والان غير موجودة بالتطبيق اتمنى اضافتها | It keeps asking me for reviews and I can't get anything done , I rather pay for a translator so it doesn't intrupt me . | I hate the new interface layout. Please provide a option to use the old gui. | Recent updates forced me to go back to my history each time I want to use a different phrase that I’ve already had translated. I didn’t have to do this previously, and it’s much more frustrating and time-consuming! I don’t like it at all!!! | Ayuda bastante pero en mi caso utilizó bastante para traducir español a inglés  o lo contrario
Pero me gustaría que le agreguen cuando se escucha como se pronuncia en modo despacio como dúo lingo 
Y me gustaría que le agreguen como leer en letras o palabras la pronunciación en español como los glasés de inglés te explican como pronunciarlo a español
Solo eso le ase falta | I’m trying to practice my Spanish but the record options doesn’t last long enough to even record one sentence so what’s even the point of having the option to record? Also the settings are very limited | The last update made my widget invisible. Please fix | 能不能改善一下转录功能，各种听不懂音频，还不如老版本的好用 | For more than 5 years, I have been using Google translate between Spanish & English while studying with Duolingo.

So amazing so helpful i appreciate all you beings at Google and I can’t wait to see what you come out with next because totally awesome.

Thank you

And thank you again | I would of given this a better review but when say a word in Greek it most of time comes out as a completely different word. I can say word multiple times and might even come out differently every time. Yes I tried to say it slowly or faster still the same. But if type it it does translate it correctly | This app is very helpful and overall a gift. However, there are many text-to-speak options missing for formerly colonised African languages. 

For example they have Igbo, one of many languages spoken in Nigeria, but they do not have text-to-speak options. 

Naturally someone will say that since there are so many languages, Google cannot get the text-to-speech feature for all of them. 

They will also say they hope to get around to it like they have for other African languages, but sadly the countries which once tried to erase the existence of these languages have long since been fully featured on the app.

There seems to be a prioritising of languages which allows some to be fully featured, while others waste away in waiting with hopes of being recognised by the world, though many taste the use of them on their tongues. 

I hope to one day have text-to-speech for Igbo and many other African languages, but I am tempted to think it would be unwise to wait with bated breath. title: PID Lítačka
description:
The PID Lítačka app allows you to have all the necessary information about your journey at your fingertips.

The PID Lítačka mobile app is a comprehensive guide to transport in Prague and the Central Bohemian Region. It enables you to find current public transport connections based on your location and also recommends the type of ticket you need for your journey. The app works with up-to-date data about closures, disruptions, and so on. If you wish to use the app for buying tickets regularly, you can create an account and have your tickets safely under control. You can store your payment card in the app and pay with a single click, or use Google/Apple Pay. The app allows you to purchase tickets in advance and activate them gradually before boarding a vehicle. Furthermore, you can purchase a subscription ticket (coupon) from 1 month up to 1 year directly in the app.

A new feature in PID Lítačka is the ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague. This new functionality allows you to store the license plates of your personal and company vehicles and pay for parking as easily and quickly as for a ticket.

The app can be used even without registration.

What else does the app offer?

-Check-in via the mobile app, or the possibility to use the mobile app as an identifier for long-term time tickets
-Find the fastest connection including closures and restrictions, and optimal tickets for your journeys
-Display a map of connections including navigation to the stop
-Display the status of your long-term coupon and your identifiers
-Buy tickets in advance with the option of later activation if necessary
-Forward an unactivated ticket to another person who can simply activate it themselves
-Purchase up to 10 tickets and activate multiple of them at once, for example for family and friends
-Display current departures from the stop, including delays
-Show an overview of nearby stops, passing lines, ticket sales locations
-Display a map of P+R parking lots and their occupancy
-Browse current closures, disruptions, or news in transport
-Monitor the status of barrier-free facilities
-Ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague
-The option to use Google/Apple Pay for payment, or click to pay
releaseNotes:
* Visual notification of a 2-minute activation period in the ticket hopper in case of at least one unused ticket
* You can now share routes in the calendar or, for example, in an SMS
* Added user feedback on the app in the "More" section
* In the "Advanced" section, you can now find information in the connection details about whether the connection is air-conditioned
reviews:
This app let me plan each of our in-town and day trips simply. I could buy tickets on the fly or plan our route the night before. With tickets in hand, I always knew what stop or platform to go to. | Agree with others: easy to use, mapping a route provides cost and link to pay, Apple Pay enabled. One of the best transportation apps I’ve used. | Twice now I have tried to create an account. I signed up with one email and a message said I’d be getting a verification email. I have been checking for over 24 hours and there is no email. So I then tried a different email and still no verification email ever came. Update: the emails all went to my spam. That hasn’t happened in forever, therefore I attribute it to whatever is in the origin of the email sender. | Should be an instance for everyone else! | I was only in Prague for a few days but this app worked very well, the design and user interface was excellent, it was easy to use and figure out, each ticker gives you a bar code but we never got stopped so not sure if that works for the police. One thing to note is when you buy tickets on the app you need to wait 2 minutes after you activate before it becomes valid so buy tickets before you get on | Not a bad app, but the two minutes to activate is a major issue. The inspectors come and will fine you with as little as 10 seconds left before it activates, and since they can check whomever they want, they often target women, especially those riding alone. I just ended up buying the year pass, but for people who ride only once or twice, the two minutes is a huge pain. Either you get on before your ticket activates and hope, or you activate it before the bus/tram/metro even arrives—cutting into the amount of time you’ve paid to be allowed to travel. And if the bus is late, and so your ticket expires before you reach your destination? That’s a fine, too. Major design flaw! | Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Always very easy to use! | Everything I needed for public transport in Prague. It was super easy to register and pay via Apple Pay. | I enabled alert for “Exceptions” and found it was too many notifications. I disabled it within the app but still receive alerts. 

Otherwise, for purchasing lowest-price tickets I find it is the most useful app, even for long trips outside of Prague. | Every time I search for a connection and press "Search", it instead searches for the most recent connection from my search history. This bug has been there for months, there's no way to report it from the app, so obviously the developer doesn't care at all about their user experience. I'm switching to pubtran. | I was just about to buy two tickets on my phone and found out that only one has been purchased. I wanted to purchase another one for my wife and got an error, even though money was deducted from my account!
What do I do when an inspection comes?! | Terrible that the app doesn’t notify when you pass expires. This cost me CZK824 in fines. 

The app is very poor indeed and they refuse to reimbursement for their design flaw. 

No Apple Wallet integration. 

App redirects you to the crappy website so you have to login to a website within an app. | You can’t buy tickets with iOS 13 as your OS. The tickets do not show up so I was forced to buy a paper ticket. | Is this app not compatible with iOS 13? I am not able to buy any tickets, the screen to buy just says “ticket selection could not be loaded”. My wife’s phone had no problem on iOS 12. | Great app. Clear navigation options, accurate timetables and with Apple Pay integration, makes it super easy to purchase tickets. Other translation apps take notice! | Must have, works perfectly fine. It has all the live updates that you need. | It is decent enough when it functions properly, but in 90% of the time you'll see a message saying "At this moment there is no connection for the data entered."

And you'll need to click the 'search' button again and again and again in order to see the results. | Aplikace jako taková je celkem povedená, ale velmi často v ní dochází k této chybě: "Pro zadané hodnoty v tuto chvíli neexistuje žádné spojení." K této chybě dochází nezávisle na zadaných hodnotách a dochází k ní i na dobrém připojení, např. na 4G nebo WiFi. Pokud hledání např. pětkrát zopakuji, tak se většinou nakonec najde. K této chybě nedochází vždy, ale zhruba při polovině pokusů. Asi jde o přetížené servery nebo něco podobného.

Další chyba není tak závažná, ale je taky otravná: Když třeba omylem kliknu na zadání času odjezdu, tak se vybere nějaký konkrétní čas a už to nijak nejde vrátit na "teď". Jediná možnost je aplikaci shodit a znovu zapnout. | Skvělá aplikace bez reklam, jízdní rady včetně schémat PID a jednoduchého nákupu. Ma anglickou i německou verzi. Super. | Aplikace je v současnosti dobrá jen na kupování jízdenek. Vyhledat spojení a další funkce nefungují. Uvítala bych možnost i zjistit zastávkové jízdní řády. A neškodila by možnost zakoupení 1/2 denní nebo jednodenní sms jízdenky. | Coming first-hand from the Prague Public Transport Co., this is, hands down, the best public transport app for Prague. Take it from a local.

title: ČSOB Smart
description:
With ČSOB Smart you have the whole bank and insurance company in your mobile.

You are not a client yet? It is not a problem, you can become one right in the app – opening a current account takes only few minutes. 

Why it is great to have ČSOB Smart:
 
1. Your money is safe, it is protected not only by your bank identity, but also by Face ID or Touch ID. 

2. You always know how much money you have, both in your current and savings account, and even on investments account. 

3. It makes payments easy, even invoice payment, thanks to the possibility to scan it from a QR code. 

4. You have a perfect control of accounts, mortgages, loans, insurance and other ČSOB products. 

5. You can change your card limit, display forgotten PIN code, or temporarily lock the card, and it all takes no time. 

6. It allows you to easily arrange a loan, savings, investments, travel insurance and other products. 

7. Here you may manage your insurance contracts, report an insurance event and monitor its handling progress. You can also find here your insurance documents, such as your Green Card.

8. You can customize it according to your needs, adjust the order of the products or set the dark mode of an app. 

And that's not all! You can explore more features after downloading it.
releaseNotes:
• News and articles – magazine and newspaper articles, including those that are only available with a subscription elsewhere
• Drag&Drop Payment
• Further improvements and bug fixes
reviews:
The new mobile app version looks super crowded on the screen, even though i have a phone with a big screen | It would be great if automatic assistant can understand English | It took ages but iPad support is finally here! | I could understand the format if I wanted to use it on my phone, but where is the app sized for a tablet? This is certainly NOT easier or more convenient to use than the previous app. Give us the option of the old format, please! The absolute mess of trying to activate the smart key, ridiculous! It took me 40 minutes just to set it up so I could even access my account at all, and when I finally got it to work, I couldn’t find anything I was looking for without a lot of searching. I hate it! | Banking app that has all standard features available. New version with Kate is handy and can process payments easy even through voice.
Performance could be better, but improves over time.
Reliable banking app for everyday usage.

title: Captions: For Talking Videos
description:
MEET CAPTIONS APP, THE AI POWERED CREATIVE STUDIO 

Captions harnesses artificial intelligence to allow anyone, anywhere to produce studio-quality videos from their iPhone with just a few taps. Use Captions to support every part of the video creation process, from scripting and recording, to editing and sharing. 

TOP FEATURES TO FUEL YOUR SUCCESS 

Automatically generate the most accurate captions and subtitles for portrait, vertical, square, and landscape video formats in over 25 languages.

Generate compelling scripts in seconds using AI technology, which seamlessly integrates into our Teleprompter feature.

Use the Teleprompter with any camera app, allowing you to deliver your key messages as effectively as possible.


Use our AI Eye Contact feature to correct your eye contact and make it appear as if you’re looking directly at the camera, even if you’re reading from a script.


Edit your videos faster with AI Edit which can add automatic jump cuts, images, emphasis, emojis, and more — all with one tap.


Expand your reach with Autodub and translate your exact voice into another language. Remove language barriers! 


Simplify your posting process with AI-generated video titles, descriptions, and hashtags, all automatically provided by our app.


Export your transcript text in SRT format or seamlessly integrate it into any other app or platform.

Experience stunning 4K and HDR support for the highest-quality videos.

Easily share your creations on popular platforms such as Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube, YouTube Shorts, Twitter, or directly to your photo library.


THE MOST ACCURATE AUTOMATIC CAPTIONS AVAILABLE 


Powered by cutting-edge speech recognition technology, the app also allows users to add eye-catching dynamic word-by-word captions (video subtitles) using Whisper speech-to-text by OpenAI – the world's most powerful speech-to-text engine.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CONTENT

With Captions, you have the freedom to choose from a wide range of captivating caption styles. You can also upload your favorite fonts directly to the app. 

IGNITE YOUR ENGAGEMENT

Don't let your videos go unnoticed! Boost your engagement within seconds by adding dynamic captions. Research shows that 85% of viewers prefer to watch videos without sound. By incorporating captions, you ensure that your message will be effectively communicated to the maximum number of potential viewers.

IMPROVE YOUR CONTENT’S ACCESSIBILITY

Captions also play a crucial role in making your videos more accessible. With over 6% of the world's population experiencing some degree of hearing loss, it's essential to prioritize inclusivity with your content. By adding captions, you enable individuals with hearing impairments to fully enjoy and engage with your content.


Captions offers creators the easiest way to create and edit content, simplifying the creation process so one doesn't get lost in the weeds. Try it today and see the difference it can make. Download now!

Terms of Use: https://captions.ai/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.captions.ai/privacy/policy
releaseNotes: bug fixes and improvements
reviews:
Every time I finish a voiceover if I leave the app.  It saves without the voiceover!!    And if I want to update my video it has to be the exact same length as the one I’m replacing or the app won’t even “see” it in my photos and videos.  And you can’t make the voiceovers have any emotion or excitement or sarcasm to them | The app works amazingly however you have to have the monthly subscription to export videos. | Una aplicación muy amigable, es super sencillo y útil su uso. | very incredible he liked it a lot 5 stars plus my 10 stars very good the creator of the app for iOS I thank you for helping a lot with the app I am grateful for you there are many interested in helping users gratitude for my presence | You have to pay pro just to make it not worth it | Doesn’t create a voice clone. title: Meteoradar
description:
Meteoradar – nejpřesnější předpověď srážek pro Česko

Aplikace Meteoradar je jednou z nejstahovanějších aplikací na iPhone a iPad. Aplikace nabízí řadu zajímavých funkcí. Zobrazí nejen aktuální srážky nad Českem, ale i jejich předpověď na následující hodinu. Nechybí ani údaje o aktuálních teplotách, větru, srážkách nebo stavu počasí. Meteoradar umožňuje sledovat vývoj počasí téměř v reálném čase. Data jsou aktualizována každých 10 minut.

* Srážky a jejich předpověď (radar)
Aplikace na mapě zobrazí aktuální srážky nad Českem a Německem s přesností až 1 km. Nechybí ani předpověď jejich vývoje na následující hodinu (dostupné u českého radaru). Přesně tak poznáte, kdy přeháňka dorazí přímo do vašeho města. Radarové snímky Česka poskytuje ČHMÚ a snímky Německa poskytuje DWD.

* Údaje z meteostanic
Na mapě jsou dostupné údaje z více než 150 meteorologických stanic. Meteorologické stanice zaznamenávají teplotu, vítr, srážky ale i vlhkost nebo tlak vzduchu. U každé stanice je v grafu uveden vývoj teploty.

* Blesky
V případě bouřek aplikace zobrazí i místa, kde uhodil blesk. Na základě radarového snímku potom poznáte, jak se bude bouřka nadále vyvíjet.

* Meteozprávy
Aplikace zobrazuje informace o počasí přímo od uživatelů, kteří sledují počasí v daných místech.

* Přidávejte informace o počasí
Aplikace umožňuje zasílat informace o počasí ve vaší lokalitě. Pokud se u vás vyskytuje například silná bouřka, stačí v aplikaci vytvořit hlášení o počasí, které si následně přečtou stovky lidí. Přidat můžete aktuální fotografii či popis počasí. Ostatní lidi tak varujete před nepříznivým počasím, které panuje ve vašem městě a pravděpodobně zasáhne i další.  

* Widget
Díky přehlednému widgetu získáte rychlý přehled o aktuálních srážkách na našem území.

Poskytovatelem radarových snímků a detekce blesků z Česka je Český hydrometeorologický ústav. Poskytovatelem radarových snímků Německa je DWD. Databázi kamer poskytl sever Webcams.cz.
releaseNotes:
- Zobrazení aktuality o počasí (lze povolit / zakázat v nastavení)
- Nově lze nastavit průhlednost radaru
- Tmavý režim a optimalizace pro iOS 13
- Opravy chyb
reviews: Love that you can see so much territory and get a whole one hour forecast. Thanks! | Po otevření aplikace okamžitě zčerná a sama se zavře.. | Konečne nejaký radar aj pre CZ/SK. Účel spĺňa, ale dizajn je hrozný - ako port z Androidu - zapracujte na tom.

title: Google Photos: Backup & Edit
description:
Google Photos is a smarter home for all your photos and videos, made for the way you take photos today.

“The best photo product on Earth” – The Verge
“Google Photos is your new essential picture app” – Wired
“Upload the pictures, and let Google Photos do the rest” – The New York Times

• 15 GB OF CLOUD STORAGE: Every Google Account comes with 15 GB of storage and you can choose to automatically back up all your photos and videos in Storage saver quality or Original quality. Your photos are safe, secure, and private to you. All photos and videos you backed up in Storage saver quality before June 1, 2021 do not count toward your Google Account storage. *Storage is shared between Gmail, Google Drive, and Google Photos.

• FREE UP SPACE: Never worry about running out of space on your phone again. Photos that are safely backed up can be removed from your device’s storage in just a tap.

• NO ADS: Google Photos doesn't sell your photos, videos, or personal information to anyone and we don't use your photos and videos for advertising.

• FAST AND POWERFUL SEARCH: Your photos are now searchable by the people, places and things in them—no tagging required.

• GOOGLE LENS: Search what you see. This preview enables you to identify text and objects in your photos to learn more and take action.

• SMARTER SHARING: With smart sharing suggestions, giving your friends the photos you took of them is painless. And they can add their photos, too, so you’ll finally get the photos you’re actually in.

• ADVANCED EDITING: Transform photos with a tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo and video editing tools to apply content-aware filters, adjust lighting, and more.

• MOVIES AND GIFS, MADE FOR YOU: Get automatically created movies, collages, GIFs, and more from your photos. Or easily create them yourself.

• LIVE ALBUMS: Share your latest photos with Live Albums. Select the people and pets you want to see and Google Photos will automatically add photos of them as you take them, no manual updates needed.

• SHARED LIBRARIES: Share without sharing. Grant a trusted person access to all of your photos.

• REDISCOVER: Get collages of photos you took a year ago on this day – perfect for #tbt.

• ON YOUR TV: View your photos and videos on your TV with Chromecast and Airplay support.


You can also upgrade storage for your Google Account, used for Original Quality photos and videos, Google Drive and Gmail by subscribing to Google One, an expanded storage plan. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US. Pricing and availability can vary by region.

Storage subscriptions purchased in-app will be charged to your iTunes Account, and automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Google Privacy Policy: https://google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google One Terms of Service: https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

Note: Face grouping is not available in all countries.

For the latest updates from the team, follow us on Twitter at @googlephotos

Using GPS in the background can decrease battery life. Google Photos doesn't run GPS in the background unless you turn on optional features.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Google Photos. This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We fixed user-reported issues and added new features to ensure that your photos are automatically organised and up to date.

Be sure to be on Wi-Fi and make sure it’s plugged in when you start this journey. I’m sure when it’s all done it will be phenomenal. I love Google even though I feel like they’re taking over the Internet. They are a true innovator when it comes to communications technology. title: Airbnb
description:
FIND YOUR PERFECT STAY WITH AIRBNB CATEGORIES
Explore our curated collections of homes chosen for their style, location or nearby activities. Whether you’re looking for a cosy cabin with views or apartments by the beach, Airbnb Categories helps you find places to stay that are right for your trip. 

CUSTOMISE YOUR SEARCH WITH 100+ FILTERS
Narrow down your choices easily with filters that help you book homes that meet your needs. Search by certain amenities, like pools and fireplaces, or filter for confirmed accessibility features, like step-free bedroom access.

MANAGE ALL YOUR TRAVEL DETAILS EASILY
The Airbnb app keeps all your essential trip info in one convenient place, so you can quickly revisit or share your travel details with others. You’re also able to chat with your Host and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates, making it easier to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi.

TRY FUN EXPERIENCES LED BY LOCALS
Airbnb Experiences are fun activities led by Hosts. They’re a great way to immerse yourself in a new place with a local expert as your guide. Browse both in-person and online options, whether you want an Experience that gets you out and about or one you can enjoy from the comfort of your couch. Book, save or share your favourites – all with the Airbnb app.

IT’S NEVER BEEN EASIER TO AIRBNB YOUR HOME
As a new Host, Airbnb Setup matches you with an experienced Superhost in your area who’ll provide one-to-one help from your first question to your first booking – by phone, video call or chat. You’ll also have one-tap access to Community Support agents to guide you through anything from account issues to billing support.
releaseNotes: Feel at home wherever you travel with Airbnb. We’re always working to better your experience through improvements and updates to the app.
reviews:
Airbnb is a well know advocate and supporter of the killings of thousands if not millions of Palestinians. The majority of the murders it funds is directed mostly towards children !!! | I have truly had the worst experience with Air bnb. I tried booking 4 hotel rooms with a specific host just for her to decline each request and tell me that the dates weren’t available, even though the site was showing it was available for when I needed it. This person had over 100 apartment units available to book on the Air bnb site. I asked if any were available and she told me NO. Not to mention my account got restricted because they suspected fraud since I tried booking 4 apartment units back to back. I contacted customer support 3 times about getting my account corrected. My account will be restricted for 10 days. They were no help what so ever. Their only solution was to have one of my guest book the apartment. I tried booking under my mothers Air bnb account just for me to have issues with her account as well. I ended up on the phone with air bnb 3 times on behalf of her account. My experience has been horrible. I have given up. I recommend using another app like Vrbo. This experience was extremely unexpected. And not to mention this was my FIRST TIME BOOKING WITH AIR BNB. I have heard good things about air bnb so this was very unexpected. | This is a review of the Airbnb app only not the service. 

The app is the best version they’ve ever released! I can do pretty much everything for my cell phone. It’s intuitive and lacks the clutter that every other booking app has her hosts. | I’ve had several good experiences with Airbnb, and when things go smoothly, it can be a great experience.  But when hosts misrepresent their properties, or act out of bad faith, Airbnb does surprisingly little to step in and address the issues.

We recently had a trip where the host listed the size of their home to be 50%+ bigger than it actually was. When we reported it to Airbnb, they said there was little they could do and any refund would have to come willingly from the host (who obviously declined to give any money back).  The host was clearly acting in bad faith and admitted the place was not as large as advertised, and Airbnb continued to let him list it without issue (my hunch is that he makes Airbnb a significant amount of money through his dozens of properties, and they don’t want to ruffle his feathers).

After a lot back and forth with Airbnb support, they offered to refund $9 on a $5,000. Unbelievable.

The system works when everything is good, but when anything else happens, be prepared for Airbnb to leave you stranded and keep your money. | In an app, like this, it would be basic functionality to allow the users to hide properties which they don’t like.
Anytime, I have to search for a rental, it’s like finding a needle in a haystack.
I keep going over the same properties over and over and then just give up and book a hotel. Lol. | Six of us traveled together and booked an airbnb. Three out of six come home with bedbug bites. I provided clear photos to customer support seeking for a solution, but they refuse to step in, claiming unless I have photos of the bedbug, they can’t do anything. Knowing bedbug bites takes few days to show plus we had a short trip, this seem like Airbnb is protecting the host. We stepped back and said if they can’t issue any refund, at least temporarily suspend the host to protect other users. Airbnb refuses again. So travelers, don’t use airbnb — your safety is NOT protected!! Go get a hotel room instead | Our family booked a condo in Cambridge Ma March 13-17.  The owner Adam was not allowed to do short term rentals in this building (Airbnb’s).  I have evidence showing this from the building owner and management.  The apartment was extremely dirty and had a horrible smell.  Airbnb asked for proof.  So I returned to the apartment and took timestamp photos.  The owner(Adam) disputed the claims/photos.  Saying I doctored the photos.  Airbnb refused to provide a refund.  I would NOT use Airbnb. | I have been a loyal airbnb customer for 5 years. I will never use airbnb again. I heard people say they dont like airbnbs because they are never clean . Now I see what everyone means. My last 3 airbnbs have been disgusting and each time it gets worse. The worse part about airbnb  is they take the HOST side before the consumer and we pay all the money. They don’t compensate you for the dirty and unsafe listing. Airbnb support told me my host was being to kind for refunding me for the days after I cancel my airbnb ! As she should because I wont be there !!!! The blatant disrespect has lost a loyal customer. Airbnb should be ASHAMED ! | I rented an apartment and I got a notice of the host not paying rent. When I contacted air bnb they said they couldn’t do anything! I paid way more than the actual rent, since I had the bill, and was shocked to know Air Bnb couldn’t do a thing! I had to handle it with my host, is what they said. Why do I pay a service fee then? How can you allow someone to post a rental if it’s not paid for on the host side? The customer service has gone downhill dramatically in the last year. So many issues with so many properties and they never help. After 6 years I am done with this app. Hotels at least are more accountable than this platforms and it’s rentals. | So Awesome | This company is a scam, it has absolutely no customer service. I have several issues with the app itself and for a stay I did using the app. I am chatting on the app and random people come and say they will work on the case but fee mins later they are gone and no updates for several days. Chat bot keeps asking do you still need help but that dumb bot doesn't see that airbnb has done nothing. I have called and talked to actual people but they say they will work but nothing is done by them as well. I previously reported issue to executive team and that person said let me work on it and get back to you but it has been more than a month and no one has responded. Disgusting app experience and with the staff of airbnb | I have used airbnb for years. They decided to remove my account with no further explanation, asked for an appeal and the information they based this decision on. Just denied my appeal and removed my account unfairly. This app was great, has been horrible this past year. | Don’t download this. For some reason it needed a card put in then it took $22 from my account. Very annoying | after years of dealing with discrimination, terrible customer service, rates above market price, and a platform that puts its hosts above its guests, I just had my last negative experience. Verbo and hotels.com are better in every way. | They don’t care anymore. 
Customer service will leave you hanging with no way to escalate issue to upper management. 

What are we suppose to do now | I had decent experience with airbnb. My issue comes in with the “review” system. I don’t feel it is fair that the app urges us to give the host a good review or it won’t be posted, but the host can write a bad review about the customer and it gets posted with no issues. Plus we have to “dispute” a negative review through support which takes forever if it even happens. It’s very dishonest and unfair to current and future users. All reviews about the host should be posted, good or bad because all reviews get posted about the customer no matter if it’s good or bad. I will not use the app anymore because of this. I deleted my account. | Verification system threw up random error messages on browser when trying to verify phone number.
Then after I try on the app it says I can’t confirm for 24 hours?!
Talked to customer service representative but they were VERY unhelpful. | I have used Airbnb for 6 years. On 4 different occasions I have booked an Airbnb 5+ months out from my scheduled trip and then had the hosts cancel on me right before. This year, Airbnb allowed the host to cancel on me 2 days before my trip leaving me to panic and scramble to find a new one. I tried numeorus times reaching out for assistance and got nothing in return. I can no longer rely on Airbnb, there is no point in booking one since hosts can cancel whenever. The hosts have too much power and Airbnb does nothing to protect or assist renters. | Just felt bitter about recent encounter with Airbnb. I had an excursion planned in Europe and my flight was cancelled in Amsterdam’s — thanks KLM. I didn’t make a flight and Airbnb would not try to workout a deal and charged $250+ even though it wasn’t our fault.
Peace, 
Max | Idk what I would do without airbnb honestly ! Wether it's for traveling , work, vacation, or lifestyle good or bad! It's definitely worth booking through, no resort fees or security deposits ! | 2 of the last 3 times I used AirBnB, the listings seriously misrepresented the property. One claimed to have 3 bathrooms; in actuality the property had only 1 toilet. The other claimed to be oceanfront / beachfront; in actuality it was ~1 or 2 blocks from the beach. (The 3rd one was honest and wonderful). 
I don’t know if I’ll use AirBnB again. It’s a risk. Owners seem fine with making stuff up and AirBnB seems not to have any mechanism to ensure accurate listings, they try to get you to “work it” with the owner. | When things go wrong your on your own.
