What a joke.  They used to be good but now have no moral compass.  Sad. | I had a host accept my alternate stay and she never refunded my money back. I called Airbnb Support and she didn’t respond to them. I lost out on $687.09 . The Customer Service is in India so you will not get any help with that either. If the host withheld your refund, the host can negotiate what they want to give back. This is company is not about the customer it’s about the host. | I don’t know how people afford to book Airbnbs anymore. The fees are just out of control. Between the cleaning and booking fees, it’s literally half the price if you stay at a hotel.  Airbnb please reign this in and go back to basics. As far as the app, filtering options are limited…and quite inaccurate. If I search for waterfront, I’m not interested in your property that’s a 1 mi drive to the water. 🙄 | At lease at a hotel you can hold someone accountable and/or get a refund if the host doesn’t hold up their end of the deal. AirBnB does not have any interest in your complaints or concerns. The rental could be completely wrong, full of bugs, mold, and you will be stuck for the duration. Don’t take my word for it, just research AIRBNB nightmares and you’ll find that this organization is completely corrupt and the hosts are more often than not dishonest in their listings and Airbnb does not verify that listings are as advertised. A scheme all the way to the top. I lost months of funds while traveling due to booking extended stays at a string of listings that fell very short of expectation, including the bugs and mold. It was too late once I realized that no matter what listing I ended up at, none of them were as advertised and the company told me too bad. Video evidence, pictures. Didn’t matter. They just assumed it was in bad faith. They tell you to settle it on site with the host. They’ll tell you the host has THE ENTIRE DURATION of your stay to resolve the issue. Even if they make no effort to resolve the complaint, it still counts. RUN FOR YOUR LIFE. | Why do you hide addresses? I’m trying to book a place and I want to look up on a map how close it is to trails. Your built in map doesn’t show the trails so I need the address to look on a trail map. In the end I didn’t book through this app. Hiding the address is shady! Hotels don’t hide their address. I booked a hotel instead! Completely stupid business model! | The idea that Airbnb allows their host to charge crazy high cleaning fees is ridiculous. You should not be allowed to charge a daily cleaning unless you are cleaning daily!!!

Airbnb needs to get rid of the cleaning fees and let the hosts build that price into their rental rates - just like a hotel. | Why is it that I can’t use the app I have. If I can’t download new one it seems wrong to force me to upgrade to a new phone. | Air bnb used to be a good option, but now since all air bnb’s charge $200 plus cleaning fees on top of all the other fees, and built in rules…. Requiring you to clean…. It lost its luster. At least at hotels you don’t have to clean and you also get free breakfast. | Airbnb used to be so much better - now the customer service is non existent, with any problems you will be speaking to a robot, and my last 3 cases I spent useless hours and nothing was ever resolved! Pull it together Airbnb! No more robots for customer service - give us Real and logical humans! | Limited trust and safety. Multiple scams ongoing related to insufficient host/ fraud checks. Constantly see reviews purporting scams and false placements. | Their host are always so awful. they all just wanna steal your money. horrible app do not recommend. They will try to charge you on top of the total price. overall a horrible app. | Worst experience staying somewhere of my life. $20/night apt and the hosts never settled on how to pay for it. Then pressed charges when stuff was missing from her apartment after I left it in perfect condition minus a used towel. | After arriving at Arthur's condo in Phoenix we requested to cancel because it was the most unsafe area we had ever tried to stay while using Airbnb. I consistently use this service while traveling for work. After the poor and lack of communication from air bnb I will most likely not use this service anymore. 
To give an example the parking lot of the condo and surrounding area was littered with drug addicts dealers and what seemed to be a tent city across the street. I highly recommend not staying here. I'm from the South Side of Chicago and didn't want to get out of the car if you know what I mean. 
There has been no support from air bnb and we will be contacting our credit card company for a refund. | I came to the Airbnb service so that I would not have to worry about finding a place to live. I found 2 ads and both turned out to be fraudulent. How do you keep the service clean? I don't want to look anywhere for housing, I'm ready to pay extra for airbnb service. They are trying to deceive me, at first they tried to take me to their third-party site, then they say that the ad I chose is unavailable, the room is occupied, they offered another one for $ 300 more expensive. Well, I agreed, now they ask to be contacted by phone before confirming the reservation. I am dissatisfied with the Airbnb service, I will never use it again and I will not recommend it to anyone. | I’ve had continual issues with Airbnb over the last year, I can never reserve anything with a vague “something went wrong” error. Tried on multiple browsers and multiple devices until I inevitably get a “too many attempts message”. | Too much expensive . Booking hotel seems to be better than Airbnb | I went to Spokane from Ohio for my sons, chemotherapy treatments me and my wife and my son, when we first got there, we booked under my wife’s account and ended up having to leave the first Airbnb. We were at because of family emergencies and they needed their home and so we booked a different day well the night after we got there I got a notification from our Host stating that Airbnb canceled our reservation and we needed to leave immediately. I didn’t understand why so my wife went into her account to check to see what happened and they completely removed her account and said that we were partying even though they had no proof or evidence because we weren’t. Well, we asked for a refund for the rest of the nights because we spent $900 and they kept saying they would escalate our case escalate. Our case never contacted us back never put the account back up and never gave us a refund for our money. Well, we went and booked an Airbnb under my name on my account and ended up getting robbed. All of our belongings got stolen and Airbnb helped us with rebooking we rebooked the Airbnb. We had the hot tub didn’t work so we wanted to go somewhere else. They issued us a coupon and the second they issued all those coupons to my account, they sent me an email stating they were removing my account from the platform for party risk of partying, again with no evidence and no warning at all and now they are refusing to talk to us at all and I just lost over $900 again which is totaling out to about $1900 that we’ve lost within the last week and now they refuse to give us our accounts back or even a gift voucher with the amount on it so we could get somewhere else to stay. Do not book with Airbnb. They will scam you. | Mario is been the best host you can ever find, this is the second time using his house and his responses are fast and efficient, thank you Mario | I have been utilizing Air bnb since its inception and I will tell you that it is the hosts that define the quality of this product and not the app.  That being said, the Airbnb app is now the most convenient tool  to find alternatives to hotels in the travel biz.  I do find google search to run a close second to this app and find google infinitely easier to use- such that I find many Airbnb on google then get the details on Airbnb app.  

I still find Airbnb format, codes and operation extraordinarily ineffective in getting the whole picture.  Even many reviews reveal hidden codes as “cozy bed” meaning its rented for 2 people but its not even a queen bed -or- “rustic” surroundings meaning a junkyard is on the same block as where you are staying. 

Also, app navigation has never been that intuitive. I still find myself vetting stuck in places and starti g the app over. It is as if they never really knew what a “back button” was. 

In the end, I have had many good experiences and one or two exceptional ones, all being because the host made it so. 

March 2020 entry

The app has definitely gotten better with a few issues remaining. Receipts can be viewed but not printed, emailed, or otherwise utilized in any way!?? House rules seem to be more dodgy than ever. Sometimes they are easily found, sometimes theyare emailed after a reservation and almost all are rants of disorganized personalities 🤪 . Airbnb survives because of really cool people hosting the coolest and most diverse amenities ever offered. Airbnb serves this market with an average score of 3 stars. App now cuts off text messages and inhibits return messages even inside the app. Het twice the messages tou cannot respond to. Cool! Just keeps getting worse! This app is different but not better Has the search by map been removed or moved where I can't find it?? Why is taking longer to find more unavailable properties? Just updated again to try features and tools. App freezes... App is still clunky but better than it was but I just got recommended stays a surprising distance from my intended destination..... The app is worse than ever and the whole AIRBNB system is getting to be a frustrating mess. I have attempted to book 5 locations in the last 6 months with one success. After a major frustration I was offered over $100 instant credits and still chose not to book with AIR BNB...... This is getting unfriendlier and more "corporate" by the day. Earlier version .... Whoever released this needs to roll it back up! I have attempted to book stays with complete frustration and mix ups. The app has reversed it performance of user ease. Avoid this new version.... | It said to update so I did and now it’s just a black screen | $300 a night? lol, don’t forget $160 Airbnb fees, $150 taxes, and of course the $250 cleaning fee. Airbnb rates are a joke and so many renters know it and offer their properties on other sites or on personal pages for much less. I doubt you’ll ever find your best deal here. | Airbnb refused to give my handicap mother a refund, even though the property we tried to rent from Stuart Morley was not handicap accessible! There wasn't even room for my mom's wheelchair anywhere and we only stayed a few days out of the 25 that we reserved. Airbnb has this individual to steal from us with no ability to recover the money and the trip interruption insurance they offer is worthless too, and didn't cover anything! Don't ever use this service or you'll lose your money and never be able to get it back. They purposely allow people that they are being prejudiced towards handicap people to continue to be on there and make money from their service. Airbnb is a bunch of thieves. | Since New update, the app will not open on my phone. Just rotates the app symbol. | Most of my personal travel is with my four-legged friend. It is so much easier and less expensive to use AirBNB instead of hotel chains.  Occasionally I use it for business travel when I am looking for a specific area and can’t find a hotel. | I had always heard from friends how Airbnb scams its customers and it happened to me too. I was held responsible for existing damages in a cabinet and was charged $150 for the chipped corner paint. I have many other friends telling me how the hosts show repair documentation and they go and proceed to over charge for existing damages in a property and they try to hold you responsible for it. | THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT YOUR SAFETY, AS LONG AS THEY MAKE MONEY OFF OF YOU. NARROWLY ESCAPED A DANGEROUS SITUATION. I recently experienced a concerning situation during a reservation with Airbnb, prompting me to share a cautionary tale with fellow users. Regrettably, my experience has led me to conclude that Airbnb’s commitment to customer safety may not align with their public image. Despite raising genuine safety concerns during my stay and providing detailed information, the response from Airbnb’s support team exhibited a lack of thorough consideration and logical coherence. The decision-making process appeared flawed, with the introduction of logical fallacies and an apparent disregard for the gravity of the issues raised. This experience has left me deeply dissatisfied with Airbnb’s customer service, as it seems the platform prioritizes financial transactions over the safety and well-being of its users. Consequently, I have chosen to discontinue using Airbnb for future accommodations. I urge potential users to exercise caution when considering Airbnb for their lodging needs. While the platform may offer a wide array of options, my unfortunate commitment to addressing safety concerns promptly and responsibly. It is essential for users to be aware that Airbnb’s customer support may fall short of expectations when faced with issues that require careful consideration and thorough investigation. The logical fallacies evident in their response, including appeals to ignorance, non sequiturs, and hasty generalizations, highlight a concerning lack of rigor in their decision-making process. Such lapses in reasoning raise questions about the reliability of Airbnb’s customer support and their ability to handle situations that involve safety and security. In light of these experiences, I strongly caution potential users against relying solely on Airbnb for their lodging needs. Exploring alternative accommodation options with a reputation for prioritizing customer safety and providing robust support mechanisms might be a more prudent choice. While Airbnb has undoubtedly revolutionized the way we travel and seek accommodations, my recent encounter has revealed a disconcerting aspect of their customer service that cannot be overlooked. As consumers, our safety and well-being should remain paramount, and I believe it is crucial to consider these factors when choosing a platform for lodging arrangements. In conclusion, my recommendation is to approach Airbnb with caution and to carefully evaluate their commitment to safety and customer support. It is my hope that this review serves as a reminder for users to prioritize platforms that consistently uphold the highest standards of service and safety. | App is very easy to use | It is nice to book and enjoy experiences but let’s hope nothing detrimental occurs because they have no resolution or policies for refunds | I used to love using Airbnb, now there is a ridiculous amount of fees added at the end and the total ends up being 3 or 4 times the advertised price. This kind of false advertising is very disappointing as Airbnb used to be much more transparent. There is a button you can select that gives you a closer number to what you will ultimately pay.  But I don’t like being tricked into a false sense of security by these fake prices.

title: Stocard - Loyalty Cards Wallet
description:
Turn your phone into your wallet and elevate your shopping experience with Stocard. Join more than 70 million Stocard users and experience the smarter way to shop.

ADD ALL YOUR FAVOURITE LOYALTY CARDS
You can add the loyalty cards of your go-to retailers such as Tesco, Morrisons and Superdrug within seconds. Custom cards make it possible to also add the card from the small flower shop from around the corner. Organizing your cards has never been this easy!

COLLECT REWARDS POINTS
Whenever you are shopping, easily open your loyalty card's barcode on your phone and have it scanned by the cashier to receive your points. When you turn on our Card Assistant, we can make sure the right card is just one tap away when you enter a store.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE OFFERS
Browse curated coupons, discounts, flyers and catalogues in Stocard – all related to your favourite stores such as Marks & Spencer, Co-op and Waitrose & Partners. Get inspired for your next shopping trip!

MORE FEATURES
You can even save boarding passes, cinema tickets and gift cards in Stocard. Save time and store everything in one app.

Do you have any questions or suggestions? Our customer support team is just an email away - simply write to support.stocard.uk@klarna.com
releaseNotes: Great news! We're excited to unveil the newest version of Stocard. Explore the newly introduced sleek, modern redesign to elevate the look and feel of various screens within the app. Enjoy exploring the new update!
reviews:
App turns brightness down to ZERO after use and it takes CONSIDERABLE time to be able to open my phone after this occurs. It's been like this for YEARS. How is this still a thing?!?! | App does not allow you to store your cards in Apple Wallet. | Need an update to work for Iphone 15 models! | Would not open. Got a “preparing” message followed by “try again later.” Didn’t work later either | I’ve been looking for an app that keeps everything in one place like this one. I’ve downloaded and tested out a few others from competitors and I was impressed by how user-friendly it is. I also enjoyed the features like the Card Assistant option. 

I would love to see an option in the future to have the ability to organize by categories (dining, gym, frequent flyer, etc). I also would enjoy having the ability to add all my gift cards. I really am looking for an all-in-one app for my entire wallet.

It still gets 5 stars because it delivers as promoted and already surpasses Apple Wallet. | In my opinion, this app works well for me. I don’t have to carry cards in my wallet and I can access them from my phone. My only complaint would be that after the last update, the widget shows very small stores logos. If you open the app, the “recently used” section show larger logos and it was the way they were on the widget before the last update. Hopefully it will be addressed soon. Very difficult to see them. | Panda Express has just started it's loyalty system and when I added into the Stocard app, it has not shown up so I had to make a generic card and the color looks tacky. Please fix it. 

And also, because it's on Apple Wallet, please change the logo on the Wallet app. | Totally SUCKS😡😡😡👎👎👎 | This app is easy.  I have all my shopping cards stored pull them up and at the grocery store they scan it or BJs.  Etc. | Used this for a few years and was pretty happy until latest updates. Since a recent update, the app hangs on start and doesn’t show my cards when I have poor mobile reception. My local grocery store is such a place, so I annoyingly have to disable mobile data just to get to my card. Unclear what is so important to retrieve from the network when all my cards are already stored locally. | I don’t understand why the widget in iOS 17 is so small. The widget in the pro version of the store card before it was updated was fairly good-sized and easy to see. Macy Minor, but I use my widget a lot, and now it’s just really hard to use. | New version just displays a black screen for several minutes. | From day 1, Stocard has proved invaluable. No longer need to worry about forgetting a card, fumbling for and through wallet to find the relevant card. With Stocard, all of my scores of loyalty cards are available easily and instantly. Where before the act of pulling out and scanning my loyalty card sometimes meant I didn’t use the card as intended, with Stocard, it makes scanning my loyalty cards so fast and simple am able to use them every time. The app is very easy to use. Highly recommend as an essential app. | Version 10.25.0 when you first open the app it’s blank you have to close it and reopen it same thing with the widget. Hope that can be fixed soon. | Easy to use and don’t have to worry about not having a card or fumbling around trying to find the right one. | Great app to store cards in one place! Recommended by the YMCA, glad I got Stocard. | 1/2024 It seems you now require location ALWAYS on to use the assistant and took away the feature to search for cards. You need to change the location tracking to WHILE USING APP. This is a big violation of user privacy - MY privacy. Please change this asap and add search feature back! The app is not useful as is and is too intrusive to privacy. | Deleting a card makes me nervous because you’ll lose all the information of the card. Sometimes you may need to track back your transactions or double check if there’s still balance on it. | Each update is slower, bigger, more ugly, and more cluttered. Tons of added, useless features that no one asked to have, in updates for the past three years. Bring back the original Stocard app! 

The pink icon is disgusting and I will never update until it’s restored to red. Also, they don’t answer customer service emails for a while. | Зачем надо было удалять из Русского App store???? Но прога норм пользуюсь с 2020 | This app is perfect. You can make your wallet all digital because you add any card to this app. You can use your cards on your Apple Watch too. | So easy to have all my membership cards all in one place and not have a stack of them in my wallet. | This app is very user friendly. It gets the job done in the accurate amount of time and I never have to searching for the cards! | Спасибо за приложение. Это лучшее приложение среди всех конкурентов! 
Пожалуйста, добавьте возможность сортировать и расставлять карты по порядку вручную! 
Пользователь сам расставит карты по порядку, в котором он привык, а в магазине сработает мышечная память при поиске нужной карты. Это в разы удобнее, нежели алфавитный список карт, или постоянно меняющийся список в зависимости от использования | I just updated my Apple Watch to WatchOS 10 and I cannot add this app to smart stacks. If I can’t quickly access this app on my watch while I’m at the check out counter I will likely stop using it. | I’ve been using this on my phone and watch for years, and it never fails me. Great app. | البرنامج جميل وتحفظ فية مستنداتك وسهولة الرجوع لها ولكن نحتاج لوحة تحكم للمستخدم اكثر مرونة  وخصائص اكثر | I enjoy the convenience of having my cards stored on this app. What I don’t like is having ads for companies that I don’t have cards for, especially companies that I have never heard of and only have stores on the opposite side of the country from where I live. | No option to add cards in Stocard to Apple Wallet. Seems like this was a feature in the past but was removed? | I used to use this from day one when it was originally released. It was great. But these days I find support non existent. 

Membership cards have changed formats over years. Never receive assistance for updating formats.

Advertising specials imho just made this simple great app a bloated mess. | This App allows you to add any store, gym, library, medical facility etc card with a barcode. The app also is Apple Watch available so can be scanned from wrist without having to use phone or digging for card in wallet/purse/key chain. In addition , if you use complications on Apple Watch, can add app to face. Along with Apple Pay, can manage both transactions directly from wrist. | I use my watch to scan in at the gym. Please add the feature to have a Smart Stack widget for quick access to barcodes on the Apple Watch. This would be a great timesaver from having to scroll through the apps to access like when the watch had the Dock feature previously. | Needs to support the new smartstack widgets for WatchOS 10 for quick and easy access | Men | I have been used this card app years I love it easy and convenient I never had a problem this is my app friend helps me keep my shopping cards neatly thank you | Really nice app. Stores all of my cards, even photoed logos for the ones not on the list making them much easier to find. Wish all of the suggested companies advertised on top of screen applied to me and were available in my neighborhood. They do have to pay the bills. Thanks for a great app. | Great app. I use barcodes and QR codes for my job that isn’t grocery and it scans and saves a copy of just about any barcode. | So easy to use and keeps all my cards in order. So convenient ! Love it! Everyone must have! | I love this app, it scanned all my membership cards and sorte rewards ones too in a breeze without having to take picture of the front card.’d love their logo to stand out as when looking for it, I can never find it. The logo is to me really bad looking too! It is for this reason only I give 4 stars and not 5. | Lost all my previous card setups!!!!’ | They send me ads that don’t pertain to me or my area. Example: Food King, I don’t have a good king within a 100 miles of me. They send me ads for women’s makeup. I don’t use makeup! | Costco will not accept scanning the card on this app. | Good app 
Definitely accurate and very helpful 
!!! | Got rid of the bulk - thanks!

ETA: it’s been YEARS since I started using this app. I love it so much! I have my grandmothers Weis card loaded in here, & she has since passed. Sounds dumb but this app does its part in helping keep her memory alive; I think about her every time I use it. | Not all apps scan tho other than that a great idea | This is a great option for all of my store cards that are not recognized by Apple Wallet. | Sto card is a great way to keep your name tags and cards and I love how you can scan and I can even add my school id | Very disappointed that Stocard doesn’t seem to work on the watch. The barcodes are so small scanners can’t read them, and the screen does not brighten. | Unwanted ads, notifications and features. No way to disable spam features. Looking for a more minimal replacement. | nice

title: Úžasná místa - tipy na výlety
description:
Více než 900 tipů na neokoukaná místa v Česku, která jsme pro vás osobně prozkoumali a vybrali

CO VŠECHNO NAŠE MAPA UMÍ

• Více než 900 tipů na neokoukaná místa v Česku, která jsme pro vás osobně prozkoumali a vybrali
∙ Jednoduché vyhledávání podle kategorií (např. rozhledny, zříceniny, větrné mlýny, lomy apod.) a regionů
∙ Místa si můžete prohlížet na interaktivní mapě od Mapy.cz
∙ Nebo si je můžete procházet podle fotek
∙ Vaše oblíbená místa si můžete uložit do oblíbených
• Přidávejte si do navštívených místa, na kterých jste už byli
∙ Tipy na výlety s dětmi, kočárkem nebo psem
∙ Výlety pro vozíčkáře
∙ Informace o místech a vstupném
∙ Fotky od profesionálních českých fotografů
∙ Neustále vyrážíme na nová úžasná místa a přidáváme je do naší mapy a na náš Instagram

PROČ JSME MAPU VYTVOŘILI?

Za mapou úžasných míst stojím já (Krista) a moje mamka Eva. Společně vlastníme cestovatelskou komunitu Úžasná místa v Česku @uzasna.mista na Facebooku a Instagramu, kam přispíváme fotkami z našich výletů a z míst, která nám posílají naši fanoušci. 
Procestovaly jsme skoro 40 zemí světa, ale přesto jsme přesvědčené o tom, že u nás v Česku máme na malém území tolik úžasných míst, že můžeme leckteré turistické destinace hravě strčit do kapsy. 

Vybraly jsme pro vás s mámou více než 600 překrásných míst v Česku, která podle nás stojí za návštěvu. Velkou část z nich pravděpodobně nebudete znát, což byl náš záměr. Nechceme totiž posílat tisíce lidí jen na profláklá turistická místa, kde se to už teď hemží turisty. Našim cílem je dávat vám inspiraci na stovky neokoukaných míst a rozprostřít tak turismus po celé naší nádherné zemi. 

Doufáme, že si naší mapu a tipy na výlety užijete. 
Děkujeme moc za stažení!
Krista & Eva Audiovi
releaseNotes: Opravy chyb

title: Rohlik.cz
description:
Tired of endless queues, running across town, and wrestling with those heavy bags? Say hello to a new shopping era! At Sezamo, we’re your one-stop shop for everything you need, from groceries and farm-fresh delights to pharmacies, pet stores, & more. And the best part? We’ll bring it all to your doorstep, faster than you can imagine. Picture this: 60 minutes, 15-minute slots, and yes, we’ll even take it up to your 8th-floor haven! With Sezamo, you’ll have time for the moments that truly count. We’re not just delivering groceries; we’re delivering happiness to your doorstep.

Why choose Rohlik.cz?
All You Need in One Place!
*Explore a vast selection of over 24 000 products, from supermarkets and farmers’ delights to pharmacies, drugstores, pet shops, and more.
*Farm Fresh Delights! Savor the freshest fruits and veggies, delivered to your doorstep in as little as 6 hours from harvest.
*Crispy Baked Goodness! Indulge in the crispiest baked goods from your favorite bakeries or ours, freshly prepared when you order.
*Artisan Butchers Unite! Discover the finest cuts under one roof.
*Dive into the Deep! Find the widest variety of fish in town.
*Price Match Pros! We keep an eye on hundreds of prices daily to ensure you get the best deal.
*Private Brands for Quality & Value! Enjoy top-notch private label products.
*Plant-Based Paradise! Over 1000 plant-based products for those with a green heart.
*Special Diets? No Problem! We’ve got over 1 000 specialty products just for you.

Delivery Delights!
*Fast as Lightning! Get your goods within 60 minutes, in convenient 15-minute slots.
*Elevator or Not, We’ve Got You Covered! No matter your floor, we’ll deliver to your doorstep.
*7 Days a Week, No Exceptions! We’re here on weekends and holidays, ready to serve you.

Our Promise to You
*Satisfaction Guaranteed! Didn’t like something? No worries, easy online refunds without the fuss.
*Baby Club for Parents! Exclusive discounts, free delivery, and more - all for FREE.
*Premium Club for Effortless Shopping! Free shipping, up to 20% off, same-day delivery guarantee, and beyond.
*Shop in Seconds! Our intuitive app makes your shopping a breeze and is always evolving to meet your needs.
*Forgotten Something? Add it to your last order hassle-free.
*Keep It Cool! We guarantee the right temperature for your goods with an unbroken temperature chain.

We Care About Our Planet
*Eco-Friendly Rides! Our CNG or electric vehicles help save the planet while delivering up to 14 orders in one go.
*Greener Routing! Opt for our “Green Slots” to make your deliveries even more eco-conscious.
*Waste Less, Save More! With “Save the Food” tech, we reduce food waste by a staggering 4 times less than traditional supermarkets.
*Reusable Bags for the Win! Your groceries will arrive in eco-friendly, reusable bags.
releaseNotes: New Language Options: Rohlik now supports both Czech and English! Switch languages easily in the profile section to enjoy and explore Rohlik in your preferred language! Also, we fixed a few bugs and added some technical improvements.
reviews:
Great app, easy to use | Doesn't work on my iphone 11, otherwise service works great. But can't use it on a phone🤷‍♂️ | Skvela aplikace s intuitivnim ovladanim. | Skvela appka, lovely servis, potraviny a jidlo. | Fakt skvělá apka | I love the reliability and the quality of products provided by Rohlik! They are always adding products that I love. Ďakujeme! | Excellent customer services. Great app. | Very helpful person walked me through my issues | I find it easier to use my Edenred card on Rohlik than it is on Kosik.

Do supermarketů jsem nevkročila ani nepamatuji a to, že mi nikdo vozíkem nevjíždí na paty, nemusím stát ve frontě na pokladnu a vláčet minerálky do patra je prostě k nezaplacení. | Awesome app. Great service irl. | Not much to add:) | The app is super intuitive (and the food is good). My main suggestion would be to make it easy to put a “watchdog” function on an item that’s temporarily sold out, something that the desktop version does well. That way you don’t have to check every half-hour of they got a fresh supply of local strawberries… | Great app that is despite the mobile format almost as rich and practical as the desktop version! Cudos to bred roll (rohlik :-) | Easy, fast and practical shopping with delivery to you house, height quality and reliability for price premium | Good app. Prices meh | English please | Wish I could have the app in English | The app is useless. I would love to use this but it’s too tedious to go back and forth translating from czech. | Generally speaking, expats in Czech are a segment that has a higher than average income and more open to change and new ideas (like ordering food online which has been present in more western countries for many years already). It seems like a big missed opportunity to not have the ability to switch the app to English.

I hope the app developer will remedy the accessibility soon.

title: ČSOB Smart klíč
description:
The ČSOB Smart Key will make it easier for you to log in and confirm payments in internet banking, as well as card payments in e-shops, or remote verification when calling the Infoline or a bank branch. You don't have to wait for a confirmation SMS and then rewrite the code from it. With the Smart Key, notifications will pop up immediately and you will confirm the request with a Face ID, fingerprint, or numerical PIN.


Why to use ČSOB Smart Key application:
• Conveniently log in and confirm the payment in internet banking
• Easily confirm card payments on the Internet
• The app can verify you remotely when calling the Infoline or bank branch
• You can use a Face ID or fingerprint instead of a numerical PIN
• Authentication complies with bank-grade security standards 
• Being offline is not a problem: app works also offline for confirming transactions in internet banking
• A map of branches and ATMs is a part of the app
• You can install it on both your mobile phones and tablets

After downloading, simply activate the application in internet banking.

For more information visit page https://www.csob.cz/smartkey
releaseNotes:
Thank you for using CSOB Smart Key!

What's new in this version?
• Bug fixes and stabilization

*** Do you like our free application? Give us a review in the App Store!
reviews:
Priserna aplikace, ktera z niceho nic prestane fungovat a reaktivace je nemozna. Jsem kvuli teto aplikaci naprosto neschopny pristoupit ke svym financim v CSOB. Napriklad Moneta a Fio to maji vyresene mnohem lepe. | Safe, secure and reliable app that enables me to authorize payments in CSOB environment without nees of sms re-typing.
App used to crash, but not anymore.
New design looks ok to me. | Pri prihlaseni do internetoveho banklvnictvi aplikace hlasi, ze je potreba nainstalovat a aktitovat smart klic. Smart klic nainstalovany a aktivovany je. | The old version was amazing, but this one crashes all the time. The authorizations don't go through. Whenever I want to authorize a payment I need to restart the app to be able to load. I hope that this issue gets fixed. Very annoying... | After last update the app is always crashing when authorizing transaction by fingerprint. I have to launch app for the next transaction again and again. I am running this app on my iPhone 7 Plus powered by iOS 10.3.3. Hope fix will come soon. | Well done app, much appreciate the comfort. I really hated those SMS keys with passion and thanks to this they are a thing of the past.

Feature request - could the PIN be replaced with a fingerprint scan please for even faster authorizations?

title: Shazam: Find Music & Concerts
description:
What’s the name of that song? Shazam will identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram & YouTube. Discover live shows, song lyrics, videos & more. Over 2 billion installs and counting!

“Shazam is an app that feels like magic” - techradar.com
“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” - Pharrell Williams, GQ
“I don’t know how we ever survived before Shazam” - Marshmello

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT
Find the name of any song. Even when you’re offline (the app will save it and find it when reconnected), using headphones or multi-tasking.
Identify music in an instant! Add Music Recognition to your Control Centre and enable the Lock Screen or Home Screen widget.
Discover live music events based on artist popularity, recommendations or search.

WHAT ELSE?
Listen and add to Apple Music playlists.
Follow along with time-synced lyrics.
Watch music videos in Apple Music or YouTube.
Find out what is popular in your country or city with Shazam charts.
Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify & Deezer.

THOUSANDS OF 5-STAR REVIEWS
“OMG... this app will blow your mind...you press the Shazam button and boom, you got the name of the song.”
“So helpful in finding good and new music you truly love.”
“I literally find my song in 1 second…”
“I love Shazam...It is helping me build a great playlist of songs I dont recognise right off hand.”
“This app is literally part of my daily routine…”
“This is the bestest app ever PEOPLE! If you want to know the name of a song or artist, this is the app you want.”
“Love the smooth integration to my Apple Music...”
“Love the lyrics section!!! The lyrics match the words of the song…”

Availability and features may vary by country.
For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/.

Find out more and get support from AppleCare at
https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT210331
releaseNotes:
Thanks for Shazaming! We’re always working hard to make the app faster and better than ever. Update to the most recent version to enjoy the latest and greatest Shazam. 

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply turn on iCloud sync in Shazam Settings. 

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

title: Sinsay - shopping online
description:
Ready for more benefits? Buy clothes, home decor and cosmetics even more conveniently! Clothes for ladies, clothes for children and babies, toys and men's fashion - all in one app. Special deals and discounts available only in the Sinsay app are waiting just for you.

From now on, you can create convenient lists of your favorite products. Thanks to the label scanning feature, you can quickly buy the desired model from within the app or check the availability of the product in another Sinsay store.

Easily transfer liked products to the shopping cart, which can now be accessed from any of your devices.

Looking for something specific? Use product filtering and find exactly what you need.

Want to locate the nearest store? You'll find it using a handy search engine; You can add your billing information and shipping addresses in the profile management field.

Was your shopping experience a success? Share it with your friends - share products on social media directly from within the app.

The Sinsay app will make your shopping a breeze.  Is your closet empty? The newest fashion for women and men as well as children's clothing at great prices are waiting for you! Or maybe you need to transform your interior? Discover decorations for the living room, kitchen accessories, bathroom accessories and other home extras! Is it time to add to your makeup bag? It doesn't get any easier - makeup products, hand lotions and other beauty products are also available at our stores!

Download the Sinsay app and enjoy even lower prices.

We value your opinion!
Explore our social media profiles:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Sinsay.BG/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sinsay/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sinsay

Rate our app by leaving a review!

title: Zalando – fashion & clothing
description:
Shop the latest fashion trends on Zalando.

We are Europe’s biggest online retailer - explore clothing, shoes, accessories, sportswear and much more. Our selection of fashion ranges from popular brands to sought-after designer labels. This combined with free returns, makes Zalando a one-stop, convenient shopping experience.

••• Style that’s as unique as you •••
- Follow fashion experts to see how they style their outfits
- Follow brands to see more from them first, including new items and collections

••• Get inspired and never miss a trend •••
- Stay up to date with news and trends from fashion experts and brands
- Discover collections and lines from a wide range of designer brands
- Stay up to date with sales, discounts, promotions and discount codes

••• Fashion pieces for every style •••
- Wide range of affordable and designer fashion: trendy dresses, t-shirts, shirts, skirts, jackets, jeans and much more for all occasions
- Selection of the latest shoes from popular brands: sandals, heels, boots, casual shoes, sneakers and many more for women, men and kids
- Fashion accessories for every style: handbags, backpacks, jewelry, hats, scarves, watches, smartwatches, textile masks and more

••• Simple and safe shopping •••
- Free returns so you can try your look on at home first
- A variety of choices and easy ways to pay

••• We love hearing from you •••
- Stay in touch and connect with us on Facebook: facebook.com/zalando
- Show us your unique style on Instagram: instagram.com/zalando
- Get inspired by our must-have collections and trending pieces on Pinterest: pinterest.com/zalandouk

Let us know what you think about the App by leaving a review or writing to us at ios@zalando.de

App permissions
- Identity: Necessary to send you personalized notifications for vouchers, sale alerts and much more.
- Photos/Media/Files: Necessary to load product images faster. Zalando will not have access to your private photos or data.
- Camera: Necessary to use the photo search and barcode scanner functionalities.

You may not use or make any purchases via the Zalando FashionStore App (the “App”) outside of the countries in which Zalando operates and which are presented as choices for you on the App (such countries, the “Permitted Areas”). To make a purchase on the App, you must be physically located within a Permitted Area and provide a delivery address or pickup address and billing address within a Permitted Area. Further, even if you place an order for delivery or pickup in your area, you are prohibited from changing the delivery or pickup address, as well as your billing address, to an address outside of a Permitted Area. By using the App, you expressly agree that no sales via the App are permitted outside of the Permitted Areas and that you will not use or attempt to use the App to make any purchases outside of the Permitted Areas. 

ZALANDO MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, THAT THE APP IS APPROPRIATE OR AVAILABLE FOR USE IN OTHER LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE PERMITTED AREAS. Those who access or use the App from other jurisdictions do so at their own volition and are entirely responsible for compliance with all applicable local laws and regulations.  Unless otherwise explicitly stated, all materials found on the App are solely directed to individuals located in the Permitted Areas.

By using the App, you agree and consent to have your personal data collected, used, transferred to and processed in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice.  If you do not agree to the collection of your data in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice, you must stop using the App immediately.
releaseNotes: Welcome to our app! We work hard to enhance your shopping joy. Bug fixes and performance boosts make your experience even smoother. Happy shopping!

The minus point is not for the app itself but the fact that certain items cannot be delivered to my country which is not indicated until checkout. This is very frustrating. title: ROSSMANN CLUB
description:
Stáhněte si rozšířenou aplikaci ROSSMANN a zapojte se do věrnostního klubu. Jako člen věrnostního programu ROSSMANN CLUB získáte spousty slev a výhod. Sbírejte body za nákupy a vyměňte je za kupony s exkluzivními bonusy. Veškeré své výhody a slevy uplatněte i při nákupech online. V eshopu ROSSMANN CLUB naleznete své oblíbené produkty v přehledně rozřazené dle kategorií.
Díky ROSSMANN CLUB výhodám CLUB se už v nakupování Vašich oblíbených produktů omezovat nemusíte.

Získejte zákaznickou kartu v mobilu a s ní i speciální slevy a bonusy:

- Jako člen ROSSMANN CLUBu získáte uvítací kupon s 20% slevou za registraci, věrnostní kupon a také narozeninový kupon
- Využijte slevy z dětského programu Rossmánek
- Mějte přehled o aktuálních slevách z letáku
- Inspirujte se ROSSMANN tipy na líčení a trendy zdravého životního stylu
- Informace o všech prodejnách ROSSMANN máte vždy po ruce
- Kartu v aplikaci můžete využít i bez připojení k internetu
- Své nákupy online vyřídíte pohodlně kdykoliv a odkudkoliv
- Online nákupy k vyzvednutí na zvolené prodejně už do 60 minut, nebo s doručením na Vámi zadanou adresu

title: My MultiSport
description:
MultiSport goes digital!

*Please note that this app is in early access. You might experience temporary issues while visiting facilities and registering the visit digitally. In such a case please do not hesitate to contact us.

Also when you activate virtual card your plastic MultiSport card cannot be used anymore. 

Switch to a virtual card in the application and use just a QR code to check in at sports facilities.

Here is how:

Create a profile on MyMultiSport, or if you are already registered, simply log in to your account

Verify your mobile number

Upload a picture of yourself

Generate a QR code and gain digital entry to all MultiSport facilities!

Find your sport and the place to be active!

The application allows you to find all locations where you can use your MultiSport card.

Browse various sports facilities and discover YOUR place to do sports.

title: My Air CZ
description:
Aplikace My Air vám přináší mobilní bankovnictví Air Bank a chystá pro vás nové nápady. Ty jsou nyní ještě v dílně, už teď si ale můžete užívat vyladěné bankovnictví.

Stačí například mrknout na úvodní obrazovku aplikace s Chytrým přehledem a hned vidíte, kolik máte na běžném i spořicím účtu nebo jak to vypadá s půjčkou. 

Limity plateb změníte díky aplikaci pohodlně třeba ve frontě u pokladny. Peníze pak odešlete i prostým ofocením QR kódu. Aplikaci si ale oblíbíte i kvůli možnosti potvrzovat platby v internetovém bankovnictví pouhým dotykem. A jestli jste zvědaví, budou se vám líbit oznámení o zůstatku. Když budete chtít, aplikace vám pošle oznámení o všem, co se na Vašem účtu šustne.  

Ztratíte občas účtenku? Pak budete velebit náš Šanon, díky kterému můžete všechny důležité účtenky a faktury ukládat do svého internetového bankovnictví a kdykoliv je máte po ruce.

Ale co si o naší aplikaci jen číst. Tisíckrát lepší je, stáhnout si ji a vyzkoušet. Ať vám dobře slouží.
releaseNotes: V nové verzi jsme upravili detail platby tak, aby pro vás byl přehlednější. Vše důležité v něm uvidíte na první dobrou. Aplikaci jsme také přichystali na překvapivou investiční novinku. Ta se na vašich displejích objeví v druhé půlce března.

title: Seznam.cz
description:
S aplikací Seznam.cz máte celý Seznam v kapse.
Při prohlížení internetových stránek stačí kdykoli kliknout na „esko“ a jste zpět na hlavní stránce Seznamu. Ta je přizpůsobená aplikaci, takže její ovládání je pohodlné a přehledné.

EMAIL V APLIKACI 
- Vyřiďte jednoduše všechny zprávy, aplikace vás navíc upozorní na ty nové. 

VLASTNÍ PŘEHRÁVAČ
-  Poslouchejte všechny podcasty z Podcasty.cz bez přerušení nebo si je stáhněte offline. 

PŘEKLADAČ
-  Také vám přeloží cizí slovíčka i celé stránky a včas vás varuje před nebezpečnými weby díky spolupráci s předními českými bankami a ČOI.

HRY 
- A když se budete zrovna nudit, zabaví vás solitaire či sudoku. 

UKLÁDÁNÍ STRÁNEK 
- Používané stránky si můžete označit jako oblíbené a ty, které nestihnete dočíst, si snadno uložíte na později.

SYNCHRONIZACE 
- Díky synchronizaci účtu budete mít navíc všechna hesla, záložky nebo otevřené panely k dispozici na všech svých zařízeních.

title: Action
description:
Met de Action app heb je nu 24/7 toegang tot al het leuks waar je normaal gesproken voor naar de Action winkel gaat. Je bent als eerste op de hoogte van de laatste weekacties en de nieuwste producten. Zie je iets leuks of iets dat je nodig hebt? Voeg het dan meteen toe aan je favorieten! Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap. Dit wil je natuurlijk niet missen. Download snel de app en laat je verrassen door de vele leuke en handige mogelijkheden!
 
* Alles van Action altijd bij de hand  Met de Action app blijf je op de hoogte van al het verrassende dat je van Action gewend bent. Je ontvangt als eerste de beste weekacties, nieuwste producten en het laatste nieuws.

* Verrassende artikelen, speciaal voor jou geselecteerd Geef in de app je interesses aan en Action toont je de producten die het beste bij jou passen.

* Stel een lijst samen van al je favoriete producten Met zó veel verassende producten vergeet je soms welke je ook alweer wilde hebben. Voeg ze toe aan je favorieten. Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap! En het mooie is dat je je favorieten op elk van je apparaten kunt bekijken.

* Gebruik de handige productscanner voor meer info Wil je meer informatie over een artikel? Met de app maak je van je telefoon in mum van tijd een scanner. Zo zie je in de winkel (of thuis) precies wat je wilt weten.

* Al je kassabonnen digitaal én op één plek Al je Action kassabonnen vind je nu netjes bij elkaar in de app. Scan je digitale klantenkaart wanneer je wat koopt in de winkel en de digitale bon verschijnt automatisch in de app.

Laat je inspireren door 6000+ artikelen
Scrol op je gemak door de app en laat je verrassen door de meer dan 6000 artikelen die Action je dagelijks te bieden heeft. Er is zo veel dat je gewoon niet uitgekeken raakt!
releaseNotes: In deze versie hebben we wederom een aantal verbeteringen doorgevoerd, waarmee we de stabiliteit van de app verder willen verbeteren. Veel plezier! Heb je vragen of feedback? Mail ons dan gerust op consumerapp@action.com

title: VPN - Proxy Unlimited Shield
description:
■ Features:
- Unlimited time, Unlimited data, Unlimited bandwidth
- No registration or login required
- No Log is saved from any users
- Simple, one tap connect to VPN
- Protect your security and privacy
- Support for multiple devices for the same account
- Support 9.0 for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod)

■ What can I do with a VPN?
- Enhance your online privacy and enable you to safely and anonymously browse the Internet
- Protect you when using a public WiFi hotspot
- Allows you to create a secure connection to another network over the Internet

You can be a premium user through auto-renewing subscription:

  12-Month Plan, first 7 days free and then $79.99/year
  1-Month Plan, first 7 days free and then $11.99/Month
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

■ Suggest:
* In most countries, it is recommended to use the IKEv2 protocol first, for better stability and connection speed.
* When the connection fails, please switch to OpenVPN UDP and OpenVPN TCP protocol in turn.
* Switching to different countries may also increase access speed or connection success rate

■ Privacy Policy:
*When the user is in normal use, we will not log any logs related to the user.
* Only when the user actively fails to connect the connection (requires the user to click the feedback button), we will collect the necessary user connection failure log.
*The connection failure log collected is limited to the success rate of our engineers to improve the VPN connection, and will not be shared with any individual or organization.

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below.
Privacy Policy: https://www.mobilejump.mobi/about/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.mobilejump.mobi/about/tos.html

title: Snapchat
description:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with your friends and family 

SNAP
• Snapchat opens straight to the camera — just tap to take a photo or press and hold for video. 
• Express yourself with Lenses, Filters, Bitmoji and more! 
•Try out new Lenses created daily by the Snapchat community!

CHAT
• Stay in touch with friends through live messaging or share your day with Group Stories. 
• Video chat with up to 16 friends at once — you can even use Lenses and Filters when chatting! 
• Express yourself with Friendmoji — exclusive Bitmoji made just for you and a friend.272

STORIES
• Watch friends’ Stories to see their day unfold. 
• See Stories from the Snapchat community that are based on your interests. 
• Discover breaking news and exclusive, original Shows.

SPOTLIGHT
• Spotlight showcases the best of Snapchat! 
• Submit your own Snaps or sit back, relax and watch. 
• Pick your favourites and share them with friends.

MAP 
• Share your location with your best friends or go off the grid with Ghost Mode. 
• See what your friends are up to on your most personal map when they share their location with you. 
• Explore live Stories from the community nearby or across the world!

MEMORIES
• Save unlimited photos and videos of all your favourite moments. 
• Edit and send old moments to friends or save them to your Camera Roll. 
• Create Stories from your favourite Memories to share with friends and family.

FRIENDSHIP PROFILE
• Every friendship has its own special profile so that you can see the moments you’ve saved together. 
• Discover new things you have in common with Charms — see how long you’ve been friends, your astrological compatibility, your Bitmoji fashion sense and more! 
• Friendship Profiles are just between you and a friend, so you can bond over what makes your friendship special.

Happy Snapping!

Please note: Snapchatters can always capture or save your messages by taking a screenshot, using a camera or in other ways. Be mindful of what you Snap!

For a full description of our privacy practices, please go to our Privacy Centre.

title: Můj T-Mobile
description:
All you need from T-Mobile in one app. Available anytime & anywhere.

Why it's good to have our app:

-	You can see information about your current spending, how many free minutes, SMS and data you have left. Top-up data is easy in our app.
-	Manage all your T-Mobile services in one app.
-	Pay your bills - without charges, within minutes and safely.
-	Top up Twist credit quickly and with bonus credit for calls, texts and data. Not only to yourself, but also to your loved ones.
-	Take your chance in regular contests or use one of our special offers.

Other useful tips how to use our app

- Add more T-Mobile numbers to your app
- All of your services in Magenta 1 are put together in the app overview and you can easily distribute shared data between numbers in Magenta 1.
- You can also easily change the tariff, extend the contract or purchase a new phone.
- Receive notifications. We will remind you that you have a new bill, or let you know what's new in the app.
- View your bill history. You can also download them in PDF. You can pay your bills to yourself or anyone else. Check the online list of services to see in detail what you pay for.
- The application will log you in automatically when you are connected via our data network. If you are dating over WiFi, you can use a one-time login using a PIN that you will receive by SMS to your mobile phone.
Help & Support.  This is a section to help you find answers to frequently asked questions.
releaseNotes: - small bug fixes
reviews:
The mandatory updates every one/few months with 270MB download size are just ridiculous. Especially for an app that IMHO does not have any added value over a simple website with the same functionality. The “best” is when you run out of data and need to get more and find out the app needs to be updated. At least the mandatory updates should be once a year at most.
The app works (hence the two stars), but seems unnecessary. | Good | Just give me free stuff. | 👍 all good, works | Vždy se vše podaří najít a vyřešit, funkční aplikace | Not enough content gets localized. | The app is extremely easy to navigate and also helpful in terms quick access of bill payments | Ios 12 not supported anymore? Why, pls?

title: Microsoft 365 (Office)
description:
Microsoft 365 is the ultimate everyday productivity app that helps you quickly find and edit files, scan documents, and create content on the go. With Copilot, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDFs all in one app, Microsoft 365 is the destination for finding, creating, editing, and sharing documents on the fly when you need them most.

With your everyday AI companion, Microsoft Copilot, integrated into the Microsoft 365 app, you can boost your productivity through search, chat, and image generation, powered by the latest OpenAI models, GPT-4 and DALL·E 3. Your Copilot outputs can easily be exported to Word for editing and saving for future access.

Do everything from drafting a blog in Word, managing your budget in Excel, or practicing your next business pitch in PowerPoint. The Microsoft 365 app is a complete documents editor right at your fingertips. With unique mobile editing features, you can scan and sign important documents, create PDFs, and update your resume anywhere, in just a few taps.

Using cloud services like OneDrive and trusted security, the Microsoft 365 app safely stores your files and helps maximize your productivity in both work and life tasks.

Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Copilot - all in one app:
• Ask Copilot questions as your AI-powered Chat Assistant to improve productivity. 
• Use Word for your cover letter or CV with professional templates.
• Practice your presentation with Presenter Coach in PowerPoint.
• Use Excel to create or modify worksheets with one of the many templates.
• Try Designer* to create designs and edit photos in seconds with the power of AI.
• Share, edit and collaborate with others in real time.

*Designer is currently in preview and available for free. A paid Microsoft 365 subscription will be required to continue using some of these features post preview.

PDF Scanning & Editing Capabilities:
• Scan PDF files and convert them into Word documents instantaneously—and vice versa—with the PDF converter tool.
• Edit PDF files on your device quickly and easily while on the go.
• PDF Reader allows you to access and sign PDFs.

Convert Pictures and Documents:
• Create docs by snapping a picture or uploading a photo from your camera roll.
• Transform a photo of a table into an editable Excel spreadsheet.
• Enhance digital images of whiteboards, spreadsheets, and documents.

Anyone can download the Microsoft 365 app for free and start using it right away. Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Subscription & Privacy Disclaimer
Unlock the full Microsoft 365 experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC and Mac.

Monthly Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your App Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your App Store account settings.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on iOS. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=519111

title: Weather & Radar - Storm alerts
description:
Key Features of Weather & Radar’s free app:

- Hourly and daily weather forecast
- 14-day weather outlook
- Worldwide live weather map
- RainfallRadar
- TemperatureRadar & WindRadar
- Pollen Count
- Severe weather warnings & Warning Maps
- Coastal and tidal information
- Weather Widget
- Snow & ski information

Weather App
Be up-to-date at all times with Weather & Radar’s free app! Always know whether the sun will be out, a thunderstorm is approaching, if it’ll rain, hail or snow. The weather app will accurately display current weather conditions for your exact position and any further location worldwide.

Weather Forecast
Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest specifics on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, wind, sunshine hours, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed displays of air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather outlook feature.

WeatherRadar
More than just your standard weather map! See the latest enhanced radar map, which includes areas of cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snowfall, hail, thunderstorms, and lightning strikes. This feature allows you to see meteorological conditions for various locations at once. Trace the movement of cloud formations and active storms, to see, if they will hit or bypass your location. Switch to RainfallRadar and see rainfall only against a more subtle backdrop.

WindRadar & TemperatureRadar
Gone with the wind or not? Our latest feature, the WindRadar lets you track the wind, including wind direction and peak gusts. One click away you can find the TemperatureRadar, which allows you to see the temperature on a beautifully coloured map, up to 3 days ahead!

Pollen Count
Current information on pollen count: Weather & Radar provides free, reliable and local information on pollen count in your area with details of 14 types of pollen to tackle all forms of hay fever plus pollen forecasts for the next six days.

Severe Weather Warnings & Warning Maps
Activate severe weather warnings and receive push notifications when extreme weather conditions such as storms, thunderstorms, lightning, heavy winds or snow are underway. The Warning Map lets you see where warnings have been issued - Europe-wide!

World Weather
Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. World weather at your fingertips!

Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device.

Coastal & Tidal Information
Live near the sea? You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to see water temperatures, wave heights, high and low tide times for coastal areas.

Snow Info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for major Ski locations in Europe.

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalise your main page!

Weather & Radar Ad-free is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user’s Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user’s Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Apple will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Ad-free, free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.

Terms and Conditions: http://www.weatherandradar.com/ios/terms-of-use/

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.co.uk
releaseNotes:
With the latest update, you can now tap locations in the WeatherRadar to access the forecasts even faster. We are always working behind the scenes to make Weather & Radar even better! 

If you have questions or suggestions, feel free to send us an email on info@weatherandradar.co.uk.

title: Bageterie Boulevard
description:
Máš hlad? Honí tě mlsná? Lednička je daleko? Sporák není tvůj parťák? Nevadí. Objednávej svoje oblíbené jídlo z Bageterie Boulevard jednoduše a rychle přímo ze svého telefonu.

V několika málo krocích, pohodlně a přehledně. S rozvozem nebo k vyzvednutí na pobočce. Je to na tobě.
releaseNotes: Tato verze aplikace obsahuje opravy drobných chyb a vylepšení přispívajících k lepšímu uživatelskému zážitku. Děkujeme vám za vaši podporu a cennou zpětnou vazbu, která nám pomáhá neustále zlepšovat naši aplikaci.
reviews: How is it possible that there’s no way to specialize sandwiches? You can only choose the bread type, but can’t say “no onions” or anything like that. It makes the app useless for me. It’s possible in the restaurants on the machines, but not the app? Absurd.

title: Google Calendar: Get Organised
description:
Get the official Google Calendar app for your iPhone or iPad to save time and make the most of every day.

• Different ways to view your calendar – quickly switch between month, week and day views.
• Events from Gmail – flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations and more are added to your calendar automatically.
• Tasks – create, manage and view your tasks alongside your events in Calendar.
• Video conferencing – easily add video conferencing to Calendar events.
• Quick event creation – Smart Suggestions for event titles, places and people save you time when creating events.
• All your calendars in one place – Google Calendar works with all calendars on your device, including Exchange and iCloud.

Google Calendar is part of Google Workspace. With Google Workspace, you and your team can:
• Schedule meetings quickly by checking colleagues' availability or layering their calendars in a single view
• See if meeting rooms or shared resources are free
• Access from your laptop, tablet or phone
• Publish calendars on the web
releaseNotes: • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
reviews:
Month view widget was the best thing ever.  Boooooo. | A friend referred me to this app. I downloaded it to have a resource that I could easily keep track of my EMT schedule since it gets pretty hectic. Let me tell you it is fantastic. I love love love how the layout looks, and you can customize so much on it. The perfect tool that I was looking for! | I would like to suggest the ability to change the description/notes of an event created without having to edit that particular event. An example would be the Notes section under contacts in an Apple phone. | Where is the month view widget like on Android! Update: quit being evil | If I have an appointment 6 months out the only way to get there is manually scroll through the months! | Widget needs to show upcoming and past due tasks.  Tasks need an option for push notifications. | This is exactly what every busy family needs! I do wish I had more colors though. By the time I give everyone a color for personal and a color for work I don’t have many colors left. I’d also like a dark mode. I sit behind 8 screens for 12 hours. My calendar is frequently pulled up a dark mode would be easier on my eyes | Sorry I’m not too much love love you miss miss baby miss love | One of the best parts of Google Calendar was the widget so I could see everything at a glance. But the new update removed the widget as an option so now I have to open the app to see my calendar. | Make it so “Google calendar” icon shows the actual date on it instead of always “31”.
Thanks | No se agendan mis tareas por mucho tiempo, por ejemplo, si ponía una tarea que tiene que repetirse todos los días, esta tarea desaparece a los meses, por qué?????? | Search is limited to two years. I switched to Apple calendar and had much better results. | After enduring broken widgets for weeks it is back to Apple Calendar for me. | Latest update has the calendar widget fixed. Excellent calendar. | Whoever designed the feature that snaps your calendar back to today’s date as you flip back-and-forth between apps should be fired for not understanding how people use calendars in general. They are a reference, so if your reference is unstable like this one is, it’s basically unusable. I am very close to finding a different calendar app because I cannot schedule my kids afterschool activities like this, constantly reverting to the date I am looking for. I am opening my calendar and referencing it against other sources of information. Its absolutely insane that this was thought thought to be a good idea. Even crazier that it’s lasted so many updates. An utter fail. | Deberían añadir esa fecha que hoy en día es muy importante para las mujeres 8 de marzo día internacional de la mujer! 

2 no me gusta sus tonos de verde 
Para recordatorio 
Por ejemplo mi cumpleaños yo quisiera modificar el color del recordatorio 
Y no se puede hacerlo… | And now it is working fine | Use the widget all of the time or I used to | There’s no way to move an event to a different calendar after it’s created. You can copy it, but that’s extra hassle | please fix the widget! | Phone app display reveals incorrect date, a constant ‘31’, undermining use of calendar as useful icon.  Thus, app is not used on phone.  Sharing calendar topics for mutual viewing by peers is useful, as is color coded topics and reminder feature.  Static icon on phone is quite the imbalancer | Absolutely love my gcal, but where did the widget go?! I absolutely adore having the widget on my lockscreen, and I feel lost without it! | Removed the best and most practical feature | I’ve used Google Calendar for years but lately it’s been absolute garbage. I use it to help keep track of my appointments and have it send me alerts. Lately I get almost zero alerts, even when the event clearly says it will send one 15 minutes prior. I’ve missed several appointments because of this, as I expected the alerts to go through when they were set. Secondly, the calendar has a weird time conversion issue. For some reason, even though I set my times to my time zone, whenever I travel to a different zone then back to my home, it assumes it needs to convert the time and sets my events 1-2 hours in the future of what they were supposed to be. How does a billion dollar company drop the ball on a simple calendar app like this? I’ve tried restarting my phone and reinstalling the app, but eventually the issues come back. Please fix this. How you are #11 in productivity is beyond me. | before you read more reviews i just wanted to point out that almost 100% of the negative reviews are from user error. it's crazy that that amount of people don't understand how to set up events correctly (which could be blamed on a "hard to use" app but this is NOT the case). 

what i like:
- easy to navigate 
you can view your calendar a variety of ways and it's easy to select in and out of them
- easy to schedule
really easy to add events or tasks (and change their repetition)
- can sync with other outside calendars and other google apps (can sync apple calendar & can add events from gmail)
i made mine automatically grab events from my gmail and it added birthdays from my apple calendar directly onto the app
- can layer events from multiple emails
i have five gmails and it can have events from all of them at once in one place 
- functions great and has minimal issues/bugs
i havent dealt with a glitch nor bug yet PLUS theyre constantly updating the app to fix these nonexistent bugs
- free and can access offline

what i don't like:
- lack of colors to choose from
it comes with 12 colors but some of them are too similar. i wish i could create custom colors, too
- sharing calendar on mobile device specifically 
i had to fight in order to share my calendar with others WITHOUT them being able to edit it also. had to log into my pc and my phone and navigate it at the same time just to let someone see my calendar

overall, it's a great organizational tool to use for scheduling and planning. sets up fantastically and works extremely well. do yourself a favor and get this app!! | I have been using google calendar for YEARS. As a mom of 4 I depend on it to make sure everyone ends up where they need to be. I have been using the widget forever and depend on it because of the different colors I use for each person in the house. But now it’s gone?? 
Total first world problem but could really use help getting the widget back! | I’d like to find a calendar app where I can simply click on a day, and write a simple not. Unfortunately, every calendar app I’ve downloaded including this one will not provide me with that. Always overly planned, overly complicated, just make a calendar app where I can write a note and have it be there, instead of the app prompting me to add a contact, add an alarm time for that day, pay premium and be able to edit options. Very frustrated | I set 8 hours and one daily event has 9 hours. | This calendar app is absolutely terrible. Every single time I add something to the calendar it ends up on the wrong date due to the default date. I’ve missed important appointments due to this. It’s not user-friendly whatsoever. | I love this app, and it really has kept my life together the past few years.

One small thing I’ve noticed is that when I go to mark multiple tasks as completed in succession while in the weekly view, the ‘undo’ button pops up in front of complete, and I end up undoing things I’ve completed without noticing until later. | It’s been YEARS Google, PLEASE add more color options for setting events! 1. They’re ugly. 2. Most of the colors blend in and my little old patients at the nursing home can’t distinguish certain events because they all look the same dull color to them.
I’ve had this app personally since 2013, and I’m tired of these dreary colors! | Widgets break all the time | I love Google calendar and my life couldn’t operate without it. But the desktop version is so much better with more colors and the ability to duplicate imported reservations. I love the imported reservations for different flights, but you can’t edit it like inviting another email address to the event for the person picking me up. This used to be an option with older updates, but it’s no longer an option. Please please bring this feature back!!! I love Google calendar but with this feature and the waning amount of colors and other capabilities, I’m starting to look at other virtual calendars… | i got this app to help me organize due dates for my class assignments, but it doesn’t notify me about anything? i’ve tried looking into the settings, etc but don’t see anywhere i can turn on notifications for events/tasks in my calendar :/ it’s pretty much pointless if it doesn’t alert me about upcoming dates | Keeps updated and alerted to my life’s purpose, events, and activities. It helps me to stay connected to my family through reminders about gatherings. Helps me to stay motivated and focused on tasks and deadlines for Content Creation and my daily life. title: KFC CZ
description:
Crunchy chicken goodness at your fingertips!

KFC CZ application contains all the necessary functionality for fans of delicious chicken specialities in the Czech Republic.

- You can find the nearest restaurant and all the important info
- You can check the restaurant menu
- You can directly order KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic
- You can order&pickup into your favourite KFC restaurant in the Czech Republic
- You can use special coupons and limited offers for KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic
releaseNotes: In the new version we have fixed some bugs and made some improvements.

title: Balíkovna
description:
Mobilní aplikace Balíkovna je váš „parťák“ pro balíkové služby. Díky ní můžete snadno a kdykoliv:

- odesílat balíky v rámci široké sítě Balíkoven a AlzaBoxů po celé ČR
- sledovat a vyzvedávat své příchozí balíky
- kontrolovat stav doručení odeslaných balíků
- vyhledávat informace o Balíkovnách a výdejních boxech

Aby vám mohla aplikace přinášet všechny potřebné informace k vašim balíkům a usnadňovala vám
vyplňování informací při odesílání, je potřeba se nejprve zaregistrovat a přihlásit ke svému účtu.
Nemusíte mít obavy, celá registrace je velmi jednoduchá a nezabere víc než 3 minuty.

Odesílání balíků na výdejní místo
Vyplníte údaje o balíku včetně případné dobírky. Díky interaktivní mapě vyberete preferovanou
Balíkovnu nebo box. Zaplatíte kartou nebo přes Apple Pay. S kódem pro podání balík odnesete na
jakoukoli Balíkovnu. Balík můžete podat i na AlzaBoxu, ale nesmíte zapomenout na něj nalepit
adresní štítek, který stáhnete přímo z aplikace, nebo vám ho pošleme e-mailem.

Odesílání balíků na adresu
Vyplníte údaje o balíku včetně případné dobírky. Našeptávač vám pomůže nalézt správnou adresu.
Zaplatíte kartou nebo přes Apple Pay. Odeslat balík můžete na Balíkovně i v AlzaBoxu, ale
nezapomeňte na něj nalepit adresní štítek, který stáhnete přímo z aplikace nebo vašeho e-mailu.
Pokud odesíláte balík na dobírku, vybranou částku vám na účet zašleme do 3 dnů.

Sledování balíků
Aplikace vás bude aktivně informovat, jakmile vám někdo pošle balík. Cestu svého balíku můžete
sledovat a v aplikaci najdete všechny informace potřebné k přijetí nebo vyzvednutí balíku.

Přehled zásilek
Všechny balíky máte přehledně na jednom místě. Rozdělené podle toho, jestli jste odesílatel nebo
adresát. Po prokliku na detail balíku se dozvíte veškeré potřebné informace.

Vyhledávání Balíkoven
Zajímá vás otevírací doba některé z Balíkoven nebo třeba potřebujete zjistit nejkratší cestu
k některému z výdejních boxů? V aplikaci vyhledáte všechny pobočky i s mapovým zobrazením.
releaseNotes:
Snažíme se pro vás aplikaci stále vylepšovat. Tato aktualizace přináší:
- Zobrazení vytíženosti poboček a nemožnost odeslat balík do uzavřené Balíkovny nebo Balíkovny s blížící se uzavírkou
- Různé designové úpravy v seznamu balíků a v detailu
- Opravy drobných chyb a stabilizace
